trans-unit.source: Returns True if the drive is currently paused.
trans-unit.target: 如果硬盘当前处于暂停状态,则返回True。

trans-unit.source: Returns True if the joystick module is initialized.
trans-unit.target: 如果操纵杆模块被初始化,则返回True。

trans-unit.source: Returns True if the scrap module is currently initialized.
trans-unit.target: 如果当前废品回收模块被初始化,则返回True。

trans-unit.source: Returns True if the vector has length == 1. Otherwise it returns False.
trans-unit.target: 如果向量的长度==1,则返回True。否则返回False。

trans-unit.source: Returns True when the Sprite belongs to one or more Groups.
trans-unit.target: 当Sprite属于一个或多个Group时返回True。

trans-unit.source: Returns True when the display is active on the display
trans-unit.target: 当显示器上的显示处于活动状态时,返回True。

trans-unit.source: Returns True when the music stream is actively playing. When the music is idle this returns False.
trans-unit.target: 当音乐流在主动播放时,返回True。当音乐处于空闲状态时,返回False。

trans-unit.source: Returns a Mask, the same size as this mask, containing the overlapping set bits between this mask and othermask.
trans-unit.target: 返回与该掩码大小相同的 Mask ，其中包含此mask与 othermask 之间的重叠设置位。

trans-unit.source: Returns a Rect instance containing the width and height of the text's bounding box and the position of the text's origin. The origin is useful in aligning separately rendered pieces of text. It gives the baseline position and bearing at the start of the text. See the render_to() method for an example.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个 Rect 实例，其中包含文本边界框的宽度和高度以及文本原点的位置。原点在对齐单独渲染的文本片段时很有用。它在文本的开头给出了基线位置和方位。有关示例，请参见 render_to() 方法。

trans-unit.source: Returns a Color which is a linear interpolation between self and the given Color in RGBA space. The second parameter determines how far between self and other the result is going to be. It must be a value between 0 and 1 where 0 means self and 1 means other will be returned.
trans-unit.target: Returns a Color which is a linear interpolation between self and the given Color in RGBA space.第二个参数决定self和other之间的距离。它必须是一个介于0和1之间的值,其中0表示将返回self,1表示将返回other。

trans-unit.source: Returns a Rect based on the size of the mask
trans-unit.target: 根据掩码的大小返回一个矩形。

trans-unit.source: Returns a True value when the Overlay is hardware accelerated. If the platform does not support acceleration, software rendering is used.
trans-unit.target: 当Overlay被硬件加速时,返回一个True值,如果平台不支持加速,则使用软件渲染。如果平台不支持加速,则使用软件渲染。

trans-unit.source: Returns a Vector which is a linear interpolation between self and the given Vector. The second parameter determines how far between self an other the result is going to be. It must be a value between 0 and 1 where 0 means self an 1 means other will be returned.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个Vector,它是self和给定Vector之间的线性插值。第二个参数决定了self和other之间的距离。它必须是一个介于0和1之间的值,其中0表示将返回self,1表示将返回other。

trans-unit.source: Returns a Vector which is a linear interpolation between self and the given Vector. The second parameter determines how far between self and other the result is going to be. It must be a value between 0 and 1 where 0 means self and 1 means other will be returned.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个Vector,它是self和给定Vector之间的线性插值。第二个参数决定self和other之间的距离。它必须是一个介于0和1之间的值,其中0表示将返回self,1表示将返回other。

trans-unit.source: Returns a list of all the fonts available on the system. The names of the fonts will be set to lowercase with all spaces and punctuation removed. This works on most systems, but some will return an empty list if they cannot find fonts.
trans-unit.target: 返回系统中所有可用字体的列表。字体名称将被设置为小写,并去除所有空格和标点符号。这对大多数系统都有效,但有些系统如果找不到字体,会返回一个空列表。

trans-unit.source: Returns a list of all the indices that contain rectangles that collide with the Rect. If no intersecting rectangles are found, an empty list is returned.
trans-unit.target: 返回所有包含与矩形相交的矩形的索引列表。如果没有找到相交的矩形,返回一个空列表。

trans-unit.source: Returns a list of all the key and value pairs that intersect with the calling Rect object. If no collisions are found an empty list is returned. If use_values is 0 (default) then the dict's keys will be used in the collision detection, otherwise the dict's values will be used.
trans-unit.target: 返回与调用Rect对象相交的所有键和值对的列表。如果未找到冲突，则返回一个空列表。如果 use_values 为0（默认值），则在冲突检测中将使用字典的键，否则将使用字典的值。

trans-unit.source: Returns a list of bounding rects of connected components
trans-unit.target: 返回连接组件的边界矩形列表。

trans-unit.source: Returns a list of masks of connected components
trans-unit.target: 返回连接组件的掩码列表

trans-unit.source: Returns a list of points of the outline of the first connected component encountered in the mask. To find a connected component, the mask is searched per row (left to right) starting in the top left corner.
trans-unit.target: 返回掩模中遇到的第一个连接组件的轮廓点的列表。从左上角开始按行(从左到右)搜索蒙板,以找到一个连接的元件。

trans-unit.source: Returns a list of points outlining an object
trans-unit.target: 返回一个对象的点的列表

trans-unit.source: Returns a list of tuple records, one for each point size supported. Each tuple containing the point size, the height in pixels, width in pixels, horizontal ppem (nominal width) in fractional pixels, and vertical ppem (nominal height) in fractional pixels.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个元组记录的列表,每个支持的点尺寸都有一个元组。每个元组包含点的大小,高度(像素),宽度(像素),水平ppem(标称宽度)(小数像素),垂直ppem(标称高度)(小数像素)。

trans-unit.source: Returns a mask containing a connected component
trans-unit.target: 返回一个包含连接组件的掩码

trans-unit.source: Returns a mask of the overlapping set bits
trans-unit.target: 返回重叠集位的掩码。

trans-unit.source: Returns a new pygame.Rect() object based on the size of this mask. The rect's default position will be (0, 0) and its default width and height will be the same as this mask's. The rect's attributes can be altered via pygame.Rect() attribute keyword arguments/values passed into this method. As an example, a_mask.get_rect(center=(10, 5)) would create a pygame.Rect() based on the mask's size centered at the given position.
trans-unit.target: 根据此蒙版的大小返回一个新的 pygame.Rect() 对象。 rect的默认位置将为 (0, 0) ，其默认宽度和高度将与该蒙版的相同。可以通过传递给此方法的 pygame.Rect() 属性关键字参数/值来更改rect的属性。例如， a_mask.get_rect(center=(10, 5)) 将基于以给定位置为中心的蒙版大小创建 pygame.Rect() 。

trans-unit.source: Returns a new Surface, with the text rendered to it in the color given by 'fgcolor'. If no foreground color is given, the default foreground color, fgcolor is used. If bgcolor is given, the surface will be filled with this color. When no background color is given, the surface background is transparent, zero alpha. Normally the returned surface has a 32 bit pixel size. However, if bgcolor is None and anti-aliasing is disabled a monochrome 8 bit colorkey surface, with colorkey set for the background color, is returned.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个新的 Surface ，文本以'fgcolor'给定的颜色呈现给它。如果未提供前景色，则使用默认前景色 fgcolor 。如果指定了 bgcolor ，则表面将填充该颜色。如果未提供背景颜色，则表面背景是透明的，零alpha。通常，返回的表面具有32位像素大小。但是，如果 bgcolor 为 None 且禁用了抗锯齿功能，则返回单色的8位colorkey曲面，其中colorkey设置为背景色。

trans-unit.source: Returns a new Surface that shares its pixels with its new parent. The new Surface is considered a child of the original. Modifications to either Surface pixels will effect each other. Surface information like clipping area and color keys are unique to each Surface.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个新的Surface,它与新的父节点共享像素。新的Surface被认为是原Surface的子代。对任何一个Surface像素的修改都会互相影响。每个Surface的剪裁区域和颜色键等Surface信息都是唯一的。

trans-unit.source: Returns a new copy of the mask
trans-unit.target: 返回面具的新副本

trans-unit.source: Returns a new rectangle covering the entire surface. This rectangle will always start at (0, 0) with a width and height the same size as the image.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个覆盖整个表面的新矩形。这个矩形总是以(0,0)为起点,宽度和高度与图像大小相同。

trans-unit.source: Returns a new rectangle having the same position and size as the original.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个新的矩形,其位置和大小与原矩形相同。

trans-unit.source: Returns a new rectangle that completely covers the area of the two provided rectangles. There may be area inside the new Rect that is not covered by the originals.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个新的矩形,它完全覆盖了两个提供的矩形的面积。在新的矩形中,可能有一些区域没有被原矩形覆盖。

trans-unit.source: Returns a new rectangle that is cropped to be completely inside the argument Rect. If the two rectangles do not overlap to begin with, a Rect with 0 size is returned.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个新的矩形,该矩形被裁剪成完全位于参数Rect内。如果两个矩形没有重叠,则返回一个尺寸为0的矩形。

trans-unit.source: Returns a new rectangle that is moved and resized to fit another. The aspect ratio of the original Rect is preserved, so the new rectangle may be smaller than the target in either width or height.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个新的矩形,该矩形被移动并调整大小以适应另一个矩形。保留原矩形的长宽比,因此新矩形的宽度或高度可能比目标小。

trans-unit.source: Returns a new rectangle that is moved by the given offset. The x and y arguments can be any integer value, positive or negative.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个按给定偏移量移动的新矩形。x和y参数可以是任何整数,正或负。

trans-unit.source: Returns a new rectangle that is moved to be completely inside the argument Rect. If the rectangle is too large to fit inside, it is centered inside the argument Rect, but its size is not changed.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个新的矩形,这个矩形被移动到参数Rect的内部。如果矩形太大,无法放入,则以参数Rect为中心,但其大小不会改变。

trans-unit.source: Returns a new rectangle with the size changed by the given offset. The rectangle remains centered around its current center. Negative values will shrink the rectangle. Note, uses integers, if the offset given is too small(< 2 > -2), center will be off.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个新的矩形，其大小根据给定的偏移量进行了更改。矩形保持其当前中心为中心。负值将缩小矩形。注意，使用整数，如果给定的偏移量太小（<2> -2），则中心将关闭。

trans-unit.source: Returns a new vector that has length == 1 and the same direction as self.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个新的向量,其长度==1,方向与self相同。

trans-unit.source: Returns a new vector that points in the direction as if self would bounce of a surface characterized by the given surface normal. The length of the new vector is the same as self's.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个新的向量,其指向的方向就像self在给定表面法线的表面上弹跳一样。新向量的长度与self的长度相同。

trans-unit.source: Returns a sequence of boolean values representing the state of every key on the keyboard. Use the key constant values to index the array. A True value means the that button is pressed.
trans-unit.target: 返回代表键盘上每个键的状态的布尔值序列。使用按键常量值来索引数组。True表示该键被按下。

trans-unit.source: Returns a sequence of booleans representing the state of all the mouse buttons. A true value means the mouse is currently being pressed at the time of the call.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个代表所有鼠标按钮状态的布尔值序列。一个true的值意味着在调用时鼠标正在被按下。

trans-unit.source: Returns a set of current Surface features. Each feature is a bit in the flags bitmask. Typical flags are HWSURFACE, RLEACCEL, SRCALPHA, and SRCCOLORKEY.
trans-unit.target: 返回一组当前的Surface特征。每个功能都是标志位掩码中的一个位。典型标志是 HWSURFACE ， RLEACCEL ， SRCALPHA 和 SRCCOLORKEY 。

trans-unit.source: Returns a single event from the queue. If the event queue is empty an event of type pygame.NOEVENT will be returned immediately. The returned event is removed from the queue.
trans-unit.target: 从队列返回单个事件。如果事件队列为空，则将立即返回 pygame.NOEVENT 类型的事件。返回的事件将从队列中删除。

trans-unit.source: Returns a single event from the queue. If the queue is empty this function will wait until one is created. The event is removed from the queue once it has been returned. While the program is waiting it will sleep in an idle state. This is important for programs that want to share the system with other applications.
trans-unit.target: 从队列中返回一个事件。如果队列是空的,该函数将等待创建一个队列。一旦事件被返回,就会从队列中删除。当程序在等待时,它将以空闲状态睡眠。这对于想要与其他应用程序共享系统的程序来说很重要。

trans-unit.source: Returns a single integer representing a bitmask of all the modifier keys being held. Using bitwise operators you can test if specific shift keys are pressed, the state of the capslock button, and more.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个整数,代表所有被按住的修改键的位掩码。使用位元运算符可以测试是否有特定的shift键被按下、capslock按钮的状态等。

trans-unit.source: Returns a string representing the name (in CapWords style) of the given event type.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个字符串,代表指定事件类型的名称(CapWords风格)。

trans-unit.source: Returns a surface with the mask drawn on it
trans-unit.target: 返回画有蒙版的曲面

trans-unit.source: Returns a tuple (r, phi) where r is the radial distance, and phi is the azimuthal angle.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个元组(r,phi),其中r是径向距离,phi是方位角。

trans-unit.source: Returns a tuple (r, theta, phi) where r is the radial distance, theta is the inclination angle and phi is the azimuthal angle.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个元组(r,theta,phi),其中r是径向距离,theta是倾角,phi是方位角。

trans-unit.source: Returns a vector which has the same length as self but is rotated counterclockwise around the x-axis by the given angle in degrees.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个长度与self相同的向量,但围绕x轴逆时针旋转了给定的角度(度数)。

trans-unit.source: Returns a vector which has the same length as self but is rotated counterclockwise around the x-axis by the given angle in radians.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个长度与self相同的向量,但以弧度为单位绕x轴逆时针旋转的角度。

trans-unit.source: Returns a vector which has the same length as self but is rotated counterclockwise around the y-axis by the given angle in degrees.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个长度与self相同的向量,但围绕y轴逆时针旋转了给定的角度(度数)。

trans-unit.source: Returns a vector which has the same length as self but is rotated counterclockwise around the y-axis by the given angle in radians.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个长度与self相同的向量,但以弧度为单位绕y轴逆时针旋转的角度。

trans-unit.source: Returns a vector which has the same length as self but is rotated counterclockwise around the z-axis by the given angle in degrees.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个长度与self相同的向量,但围绕z轴逆时针旋转了给定的角度(度数)。

trans-unit.source: Returns a vector which has the same length as self but is rotated counterclockwise around the z-axis by the given angle in radians.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个长度与self相同,但以弧度为单位绕z轴逆时针旋转的向量。

trans-unit.source: Returns a vector which has the same length as self but is rotated counterclockwise by the given angle in degrees around the given axis.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个与自身长度相同的向量,但围绕给定轴逆时针旋转给定角度的向量。

trans-unit.source: Returns a vector which has the same length as self but is rotated counterclockwise by the given angle in degrees.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个长度与self相同,但逆时针旋转给定角度的向量,单位为度。

trans-unit.source: Returns a vector which has the same length as self but is rotated counterclockwise by the given angle in radians around the given axis.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个与自身长度相同的向量,但围绕给定轴逆时针旋转给定角度的弧度。

trans-unit.source: Returns a vector which has the same length as self but is rotated counterclockwise by the given angle in radians.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个与自身长度相同,但以弧度为单位逆时针旋转的向量。

trans-unit.source: Returns all sprites from a layer, ordered by how they where added. It uses linear search and the sprites are not removed from layer.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个图层中的所有精灵,按照它们的添加方式排序。它使用线性搜索,并且不会从图层中删除精灵。

trans-unit.source: Returns both the current track and time of that track. This method works when the drive is either playing or paused.
trans-unit.target: 返回当前轨道和该轨道的时间。此方法在硬盘正在播放或暂停时有效。

trans-unit.source: Returns byte offsets for each array dimension.
trans-unit.target: 返回每个数组维度的字节偏移量。

trans-unit.source: Returns first point on the mask where the masks collided, or None if there was no collision.
trans-unit.target: 返回掩模上掩模相撞的第一个点,如果没有相撞,则返回None。

trans-unit.source: Returns the X and Y position of the mouse cursor. The position is relative the the top-left corner of the display. The cursor position can be located outside of the display window, but is always constrained to the screen.
trans-unit.target: 返回鼠标光标的 X 和 Y 位置。该位置是相对于显示屏的左上角。光标位置可以位于显示窗口之外，但始终限于屏幕。

trans-unit.source: Returns the Ansi Note name for a midi number.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个midi编号的Ansi Note名称。

trans-unit.source: Returns the amount of movement in X and Y since the previous call to this function. The relative movement of the mouse cursor is constrained to the edges of the screen, but see the virtual input mouse mode for a way around this. Virtual input mode is described at the top of the page.
trans-unit.target: 返回自上次调用此函数以来 X 和 Y 的移动量。鼠标光标的相对移动被限制在屏幕的边缘，但是请参见虚拟输入鼠标模式以解决此问题。虚拟输入模式在页面顶部描述。

trans-unit.source: Returns the angle between self and the given vector.
trans-unit.target: 返回self与给定向量之间的角度。

trans-unit.source: Returns the array size.
trans-unit.target: 返回数组大小。

trans-unit.source: Returns the bitmasks used to isolate each color in a mapped integer.
trans-unit.target: Returns the bitmasks used to isolate each color in a mapped in the integer.

trans-unit.source: Returns the byte order of the SDL library. It returns 1234 for little endian byte order and 4321 for big endian byte order.
trans-unit.target: 返回SDL库的字节顺序。对于小尾数字节顺序返回 1234 ，对于大尾数字节顺序返回 4321 。

trans-unit.source: Returns the byte size of a pixel array item
trans-unit.target: 返回一个像素阵列项的字节大小。

trans-unit.source: Returns the centroid of the set bits
trans-unit.target: 返回设置位的中心点

trans-unit.source: Returns the convolution of this mask with another mask
trans-unit.target: 返回此掩码与另一个掩码的卷积。

trans-unit.source: Returns the current dimensions of the images being captured by the camera. This will return the actual size, which may be different than the one specified during initialization if the camera did not support that size.
trans-unit.target: 返回摄像机捕获的图像的当前尺寸。这将返回实际尺寸,如果摄像机不支持该尺寸,则可能与初始化时指定的尺寸不同。

trans-unit.source: Returns the current position of a joystick axis. The value will range from -1 to 1 with a value of 0 being centered. You may want to take into account some tolerance to handle jitter, and joystick drift may keep the joystick from centering at 0 or using the full range of position values.
trans-unit.target: 返回操纵杆轴的当前位置。该值的范围为-1到1,0值为居中。你可能需要考虑一些公差来处理抖动,而操纵杆漂移可能会使操纵杆无法在0处居中或使用全部位置值范围。

trans-unit.source: Returns the current position of a position hat. The position is given as two values representing the X and Y position for the hat. (0, 0) means centered. A value of -1 means left/down and a value of 1 means right/up: so (-1, 0) means left; (1, 0) means right; (0, 1) means up; (1, 1) means upper-right; etc.
trans-unit.target: 返回位置帽的当前位置。该位置由两个值表示，分别表示帽子的 X 和 Y 位置。（0，0）表示居中。值-1表示左/下，值1表示右/上：so（-1，0）表示左；（1，0）表示正确；（0，1）表示向上；（1，1）表示右上角；等等

trans-unit.source: Returns the current state of a joystick button.
trans-unit.target: 返回操纵杆按钮的当前状态。

trans-unit.source: Returns the current volume for the mixer. The value will be between 0.0 and 1.0.
trans-unit.target: 返回混音器的当前音量。该值将在0.0和1.0之间。

trans-unit.source: Returns the currently existing locks for the Surface.
trans-unit.target: 返回当前Surface的现有锁。

trans-unit.source: Returns the default pixel size, in dots per inch, for the module. The default is 72 DPI.
trans-unit.target: 返回模块的默认像素大小,单位是dots per inch。默认值是72DPI。

trans-unit.source: Returns the dimensions needed to render the text. This can be used to help determine the positioning needed for text before it is rendered. It can also be used for wordwrapping and other layout effects.
trans-unit.target: 返回渲染文本所需的尺寸。这可以用来帮助确定文本在渲染前的定位。也可用于文字包装和其他布局效果。

trans-unit.source: Returns the event type to be sent every time the Channel finishes playback of a Sound. If there is no endevent the function returns pygame.NOEVENT.
trans-unit.target: 返回每次通道完成声音播放时要发送的事件类型。如果没有结束事件，该函数将返回 pygame.NOEVENT 。

trans-unit.source: Returns the event type to be sent every time the music finishes playback. If there is no endevent the function returns pygame.NOEVENT.
trans-unit.target: 返回每次音乐完成播放时将发送的事件类型。如果没有结束事件，该函数将返回 pygame.NOEVENT 。

trans-unit.source: Returns the first key and value pair that intersects with the calling Rect object. If no collisions are found, None is returned. If use_values is 0 (default) then the dict's keys will be used in the collision detection, otherwise the dict's values will be used.
trans-unit.target: 返回与调用Rect对象相交的第一个键和值对。如果没有发现冲突，则返回 None 。如果 use_values 为0（默认值），则在冲突检测中将使用字典的键，否则将使用字典的值。

trans-unit.source: Returns the first point of intersection encountered between this mask and othermask. A point of intersection is 2 overlapping set bits.
trans-unit.target: 返回此遮罩和 othermask 之间遇到的第一个交点。相交点是2个重叠的设置位。

trans-unit.source: Returns the full path to a font file on the system. If bold or italic are set to true, this will attempt to find the correct family of font.
trans-unit.target: 返回系统中字体文件的完整路径。如果将粗体或斜体设置为 "true",则会尝试查找正确的字体系列。

trans-unit.source: Returns the glyph metrics for each character in text.
trans-unit.target: 返回text中每个字符的字形度量。

trans-unit.source: Returns the height of the font. This is the average value of all glyphs in the font. It is not adjusted for strong or rotation.
trans-unit.target: 返回字体的高度。这是字体中所有字形的平均值。它没有根据强度或旋转进行调整。

trans-unit.source: Returns the integer ID that represents this device. This is the same value that was passed to the Joystick() constructor. This method can safely be called while the Joystick is not initialized.
trans-unit.target: 返回表示此设备的整数 ID 。这与传递给 Joystick() 构造函数的值相同。未初始化游戏杆时可以安全地调用此方法。

trans-unit.source: Returns the integer id that was used to create the CD instance. This method can work on an uninitialized CD.
trans-unit.target: 返回用于创建 CD 实例的整数ID 。此方法可以在未初始化的 CD 上工作。

trans-unit.source: Returns the normalized RGBA values of the Color as floating point values.
trans-unit.target: 返回Color 的标准化 RGBA 值作为浮点值。

trans-unit.source: Returns the normalized RGBA values of the Color.
trans-unit.target: 返回颜色的归一化RGBA值。

trans-unit.source: Returns the number of available displays. This is always 1 if pygame.get_sdl_version() returns a major version number below 2.
trans-unit.target: 返回可用显示的数量。如果 pygame.get_sdl_version() 返回低于2的主版本号，则始终为1 。

trans-unit.source: Returns the number of bits used to represent each pixel. This value may not exactly fill the number of bytes used per pixel. For example a 15 bit Surface still requires a full 2 bytes.
trans-unit.target: 返回用于表示每个像素的位数。这个值可能不会完全填满每个像素使用的字节数。例如,一个15位的Surface仍然需要整整2个字节。

trans-unit.source: Returns the number of currently active playback channels.
trans-unit.target: 返回当前激活的播放通道数。

trans-unit.source: Returns the number of dimensions.
trans-unit.target: 返回尺寸的数量。

trans-unit.source: Returns the number of input axes are on a Joystick. There will usually be two for the position. Controls like rudders and throttles are treated as additional axes.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个Joystick上的输入轴的数量。通常位置的输入轴数为两个。像方向盘和油门这样的控件被视为附加轴。

trans-unit.source: Returns the number of joystick hats on a Joystick. Hat devices are like miniature digital joysticks on a joystick. Each hat has two axes of input.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个操纵杆上的操纵杆帽子数量。帽子设备就像操纵杆上的微型数字操纵杆。每个帽子有两个输入轴。

trans-unit.source: Returns the number of joysticks.
trans-unit.target: 返回操纵杆的数量。

trans-unit.source: Returns the number of overlapping set bits
trans-unit.target: 返回重叠集的位数

trans-unit.source: Returns the number of overlapping set bits between between this mask and othermask.
trans-unit.target: 返回此mask和 othermask 之间重叠的设置位的数量。

trans-unit.source: Returns the number of pushable buttons on the joystick. These buttons have a boolean (on or off) state.
trans-unit.target: 返回操纵杆上可按下的按钮的数量,这些按钮有布尔值(开启或关闭)状态。这些按钮有一个布尔值(开或关)状态。

trans-unit.source: Returns the number of set bits
trans-unit.target: 返回设置的位数

trans-unit.source: Returns the number of trackball devices on a Joystick. These devices work similar to a mouse but they have no absolute position; they only have relative amounts of movement.
trans-unit.target: 返回操纵杆上的轨迹球设备的数量。这些设备的工作原理类似于鼠标,但它们没有绝对的位置,只有相对的移动量。

trans-unit.source: Returns the orientation of the set bits
trans-unit.target: 返回设置位的方向

trans-unit.source: Returns the parent Surface of a subsurface. If this is not a subsurface then None will be returned.
trans-unit.target: 返回子曲面的父曲面。如果这不是一个地下，然后 None 将被退回。

trans-unit.source: Returns the parent Surface of a subsurface. If this is not a subsurface then this surface will be returned.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个子表面的父表面。如果这不是一个子表面,那么将返回这个表面。

trans-unit.source: Returns the pixel shifts need to convert between each color and a mapped integer.
trans-unit.target: 返回每个颜色和映射整数之间转换所需的像素移动量。

trans-unit.source: Returns the point of intersection
trans-unit.target: 返回交点

trans-unit.source: Returns the red, green, and blue color values for a single index in a Surface palette. The index should be a value from 0 to 255.
trans-unit.target: 返回Surface调色板中单个索引的红、绿、蓝三色值。指数应该是0到255的值。

trans-unit.source: Returns the relative movement of a joystick button. The value is a x, y pair holding the relative movement since the last call to get_ball.
trans-unit.target: 返回操纵杆按钮的相对运动。该值是自上次调用get_ball后的相对运动的x、y对。

trans-unit.source: Returns the size of the mask
trans-unit.target: 返回掩模的大小

trans-unit.source: Returns the size of the window initialized with pygame.set_mode(). This may differ from the size of the display surface if SCALED is used.
trans-unit.target: 返回使用 pygame.set_mode() 初始化的窗口的大小。如果使用 SCALED ,则可能与显示表面的大小不同。

trans-unit.source: Returns the smallest rectangular region that contains all the pixels in the surface that have an alpha value greater than or equal to the minimum alpha value.
trans-unit.target: 返回包含曲面中所有像素的最小矩形区域,这些像素的alpha值大于或等于最小alpha值。

trans-unit.source: Returns the system name for this joystick device. It is unknown what name the system will give to the Joystick, but it should be a unique name that identifies the device. This method can safely be called while the Joystick is not initialized.
trans-unit.target: 返回该操纵杆设备的系统名称。目前还不知道系统会给Joystick取什么名字,但它应该是一个能识别设备的唯一名字。当操纵杆未初始化时,可以安全地调用本方法。

trans-unit.source: Returns the three version numbers of the SDL library. This version is built at compile time. It can be used to detect which features may or may not be available through pygame.
trans-unit.target: 返回SDL库的三个版本号。这个版本是在编译时建立的。它可以用来检测哪些功能可以或不可以通过pygame使用。

trans-unit.source: Returns the title and icontitle for the display Surface. These will often be the same value.
trans-unit.target: 返回Surface的标题和图标。这两个值通常是相同的。

trans-unit.source: Returns the union of one rectangle with a sequence of many rectangles.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个矩形与多个矩形序列的结合。

trans-unit.source: Returns the version of the FreeType library in use by this module.
trans-unit.target: 返回本模块使用的FreeType库的版本。

trans-unit.source: Returns true if any portion of either rectangle overlap (except the top+bottom or left+right edges).
trans-unit.target: 如果任一矩形的任何部分重叠(除了顶部+底部或左+右边缘),则返回true。

trans-unit.source: Returns true if the given point is inside the rectangle. A point along the right or bottom edge is not considered to be inside the rectangle.
trans-unit.target: 如果给定的点在矩形内,返回true。沿着右边或底边的点不被认为是在矩形内。

trans-unit.source: Returns true when pygame is receiving mouse input events (or, in windowing terminology, is "active" or has the "focus").
trans-unit.target: 当pygame接收到鼠标输入事件时返回true(或者用windowing术语来说,是 "活动 "或有 "焦点")。

trans-unit.source: Returns true when the argument is completely inside the Rect.
trans-unit.target: 当参数完全在Rect内时返回true。

trans-unit.source: Returns:
trans-unit.target: Returns:

trans-unit.source: Rotates the vector counterclockwise around the given axis by the given angle in degrees. The length of the vector is not changed.
trans-unit.target: 以给定的角度绕给定的轴逆时针旋转向量,角度为度。矢量的长度不会改变。

trans-unit.source: Rotates the vector counterclockwise around the given axis by the given angle in radians. The length of the vector is not changed.
trans-unit.target: 以弧度为单位,围绕给定的轴逆时针旋转向量。矢量的长度不会改变。

trans-unit.source: Rotates the vector counterclockwise around the x-axis by the given angle in degrees. The length of the vector is not changed.
trans-unit.target: 以给定的角度绕x轴逆时针旋转向量,角度为度。矢量的长度不会改变。

trans-unit.source: Rotates the vector counterclockwise around the x-axis by the given angle in radians. The length of the vector is not changed.
trans-unit.target: 以弧度为单位,绕x轴逆时针旋转向量。矢量的长度不会改变。

trans-unit.source: Rotates the vector counterclockwise around the y-axis by the given angle in degrees. The length of the vector is not changed.
trans-unit.target: 以给定的角度绕y轴逆时针旋转向量,角度为度数。矢量的长度不会改变。

trans-unit.source: Rotates the vector counterclockwise around the y-axis by the given angle in radians. The length of the vector is not changed.
trans-unit.target: 以弧度为单位,绕y轴逆时针旋转向量。矢量的长度不会改变。

trans-unit.source: Rotates the vector counterclockwise around the z-axis by the given angle in degrees. The length of the vector is not changed.
trans-unit.target: 以给定的角度绕z轴逆时针旋转向量,角度为度。矢量的长度不会改变。

trans-unit.source: Rotates the vector counterclockwise around the z-axis by the given angle in radians. The length of the vector is not changed.
trans-unit.target: 以弧度为单位,绕z轴逆时针旋转向量。矢量的长度不会改变。

trans-unit.source: Rotates the vector counterclockwise by the given angle in degrees. The length of the vector is not changed.
trans-unit.target: 按给定的角度逆时针旋转向量。矢量的长度不会改变。

trans-unit.source: Rotates the vector counterclockwise by the given angle in radians. The length of the vector is not changed.
trans-unit.target: 以弧度为单位逆时针旋转向量。矢量的长度不会改变。

trans-unit.source: Run the pygame unit test suite
trans-unit.target: 运行pygame单元测试套件

trans-unit.source: SDL maintains an internal error message. This message will usually be given to you when pygame.error() is raised, so this function will rarely be needed.
trans-unit.target: SDL维护内部错误消息。引发 pygame.error() 时，通常会向您显示此消息，因此几乎不需要此函数。

trans-unit.source: Same as for the pygame.sprite.Group. You can specify some additional attributes through kwargs:
trans-unit.target: 与 pygame.sprite.Group 相同。您可以通过kwargs指定一些其他属性：

trans-unit.source: Same as pygame.sprite.Group
trans-unit.target: 与pygame.sprite.Group相同。

trans-unit.source: Same as the Rect.clamp() method, but operates in place.
trans-unit.target: 与 Rect.clamp() 方法相同，但在适当位置运行。

trans-unit.source: Same as the Rect.inflate() method, but operates in place.
trans-unit.target: 与 Rect.inflate() 方法相同，但是就地操作。

trans-unit.source: Same as the Rect.move() method, but operates in place.
trans-unit.target: 与 Rect.move() 方法相同，但在适当位置运行。

trans-unit.source: Same as the Rect.union() method, but operates in place.

trans-unit.source: Saving images only supports a limited set of formats. You can save to the following formats.
trans-unit.target: 保存图像只支持一组有限的格式。您可以保存为以下格式。

trans-unit.source: Scales the vector so that it has the given length. The direction of the vector is not changed. You can also scale to length 0. If the vector is the zero vector (i.e. has length 0 thus no direction) an ZeroDivisionError is raised.
trans-unit.target: 缩放向量,使其具有给定的长度。向量的方向不会改变。如果向量是零向量(即长度为0,因此没有方向),则会引发ZeroDivisionError。

trans-unit.source: See get_offset() and get_parent() to learn more about the state of a subsurface.
trans-unit.target: 请参阅 get_offset() 和 get_parent() 以了解有关地下状态的更多信息。

trans-unit.source: See pygame.freetype.init().
trans-unit.target: 参见 pygame.freetype.init() 。

trans-unit.source: See connected_component() for details on how a connected component is calculated.
trans-unit.target: 有关如何计算连接的组件的详细信息，请参见 connected_component() 。

trans-unit.source: See get_default_input_id() for usage details.
trans-unit.target: 有关用法的详细信息，请参见 get_default_input_id() 。

trans-unit.source: See pygame.surfarray.blit_array().
trans-unit.target: 见 pygame.surfarray.blit_array() 。

trans-unit.source: See also fixed_sizes and get_sizes().
trans-unit.target: 另请参见 fixed_sizes 和 get_sizes() 。

trans-unit.source: See the pygame.draw module for alternative draw methods.
trans-unit.target: 请参阅 pygame.draw 模块以获取其他绘制方法。

trans-unit.source: See the pygame.gfxdraw module for alternative draw methods.
trans-unit.target: 请参阅 pygame.gfxdraw 模块以获取其他绘制方法。

trans-unit.source: See the CD.get_numtracks() and CD.get_track_audio() to find tracks to playback.
trans-unit.target: 请参阅 CD.get_numtracks() 和 CD.get_track_audio() 以找到要播放的曲目。

trans-unit.source: See the pygame.cursor module for help creating default and custom masks for the system cursor.
trans-unit.target: 请参阅 pygame.cursor 模块以获取有关为系统光标创建默认和自定义掩码的帮助。

trans-unit.source: See the pygame.image.frombuffer() method for a potentially faster way to transfer images into pygame.
trans-unit.target: 请参阅 pygame.image.frombuffer() 方法以获取将图像传输到pygame的可能更快的方法。

trans-unit.source: See the Surface object documentation for more information about colors and pixel formats.
trans-unit.target: 关于颜色和像素格式的更多信息,请参见Surface对象文档。

trans-unit.source: See the threshold tests for a full of examples: https://github.com/pygame/pygame/blob/master/test/transform_test.py
trans-unit.target: 请参阅阈值测试以获取完整的示例：https : //github.com/pygame/pygame/blob/master/test/transform_test.py

trans-unit.source: Select an instrument.
trans-unit.target: 选择一个仪器。

trans-unit.source: Set GL_MULTISAMPLESAMPLES to a value above 0 to control the amount of anti-aliasing. A typical value is 2 or 3.
trans-unit.target: 将 GL_MULTISAMPLESAMPLES 设置为大于0的值以控制抗锯齿的量。典型值为2或3。

trans-unit.source: Set an event type to appear on the event queue every given number of milliseconds. The first event will not appear until the amount of time has passed.
trans-unit.target: 设置事件类型,每给定的毫秒数出现在事件队列中。第一个事件将不会出现,直到时间量过后。

trans-unit.source: Set the RGBA or mapped integer color value for a single pixel. If the Surface does not have per pixel alphas, the alpha value is ignored. Setting pixels outside the Surface area or outside the Surface clipping will have no effect.
trans-unit.target: 为单个像素设置 RGBA 或映射的整数颜色值。如果Surface没有每个像素的Alpha，则Alpha值将被忽略。将像素设置在“曲面”区域之外或“曲面”修剪之外。将无效。

trans-unit.source: Set the current alpha value for the Surface. When blitting this Surface onto a destination, the pixels will be drawn slightly transparent. The alpha value is an integer from 0 to 255, 0 is fully transparent and 255 is fully opaque. If None is passed for the alpha value, then alpha blending will be disabled, including per-pixel alpha.
trans-unit.target: 设置表面的当前Alpha值。将此Surface拖到目标上时，像素将被绘制为稍微透明。alpha值是0到255之间的整数，0是完全透明的，而255是完全不透明的。如果为Alpha值传递了 None ，则将禁用Alpha混合，包括每像素Alpha。

trans-unit.source: Set the current color key for the Surface. When blitting this Surface onto a destination, any pixels that have the same color as the colorkey will be transparent. The color can be an RGB color or a mapped color integer. If None is passed, the colorkey will be unset.
trans-unit.target: 设置表面的当前颜色键。将此Surface拖到目标上时，与colorkey颜色相同的任何像素都是透明的。颜色可以是 RGB 颜色或映射的颜色整数。如果 None ，则将取消设置色键。

trans-unit.source: Set the current mouse position to arguments given. If the mouse cursor is visible it will jump to the new coordinates. Moving the mouse will generate a new pygame.MOUSEMOTION event.
trans-unit.target: 将当前鼠标位置设置为给定的参数。如果鼠标光标可见，它将跳到新坐标。移动鼠标将生成一个新的 pygame.MOUSEMOTION 事件。

trans-unit.source: Set the current window caption
trans-unit.target: 设置当前窗口的标题

trans-unit.source: Set the default pixel size in dots per inch for the module
trans-unit.target: 设置模块的默认像素大小,以点/英寸为单位。

trans-unit.source: Set the default pixel size, in dots per inch, for the module. If the optional argument is omitted or zero the resolution is reset to 72 DPI.
trans-unit.target: 设置模块的默认像素大小,单位为dots per inch。如果可选参数被省略或为零,则分辨率被重置为72DPI。

trans-unit.source: Set the display color palette for indexed displays
trans-unit.target: 设置索引显示器的显示调色板。

trans-unit.source: Set the full palette for an 8-bit Surface. This will replace the colors in the existing palette. A partial palette can be passed and only the first colors in the original palette will be changed.
trans-unit.target: 为8位Surface设置完整的调色板。这将取代现有调色板中的颜色。可以传递部分调色板,只有原始调色板中的第一种颜色会被改变。

trans-unit.source: Set the location for the overlay. The overlay will always be shown relative to the main display Surface. This does not actually redraw the overlay, it will be updated on the next call to Overlay.display().
trans-unit.target: 设置叠加层的位置。覆盖层将始终相对于主显示表面显示。这实际上不会重绘叠加层，它将在下次调用 Overlay.display() 时进行更新。

trans-unit.source: Set the number of elements in the Color to 1,2,3, or 4.
trans-unit.target: 将颜色中的元素数量设置为1、2、3或4。

trans-unit.source: Set the palette value for a single entry in a Surface palette. The index should be a value from 0 to 255.
trans-unit.target: 设置Surface调色板中单个条目的调色值。指数应该是0到255的值。

trans-unit.source: Set the red, green, and blue gamma ramps with an explicit lookup table. Each argument should be sequence of 256 integers. The integers should range between 0 and 0xffff. Not all systems and hardware support gamma ramps, if the function succeeds it will return True.
trans-unit.target: 用一个显式查找表设置红、绿、蓝伽马斜坡。每个参数应该是256个整数的序列。整数的范围应该在0到0xffff之间。并非所有系统和硬件都支持伽马斜坡,如果函数成功,将返回True。

trans-unit.source: Set the red, green, and blue gamma values on the display hardware. If the green and blue arguments are not passed, they will both be the same as red. Not all systems and hardware support gamma ramps, if the function succeeds it will return True.
trans-unit.target: 设置显示硬件上的红、绿、蓝伽玛值。如果没有传递绿色和蓝色参数,它们都将与红色相同。并非所有系统和硬件都支持伽玛值,如果函数成功,将返回True。

trans-unit.source: Set the transparent colorkey
trans-unit.target: 设置透明色键

trans-unit.source: Set the volume (loudness) of a playing sound. When a channel starts to play its volume value is reset. This only affects the current sound. The value argument is between 0.0 and 1.0.
trans-unit.target: 设置播放声音的音量(响度)。当一个通道开始播放时,它的音量值被重置。这只影响当前的声音。参数值在 0.0 和 1.0 之间。

trans-unit.source: Set the volume of the music playback. The value argument is between 0.0 and 1.0. When new music is loaded the volume is reset.
trans-unit.target: 设置音乐播放的音量。参数值在0.0和1.0之间。当加载新的音乐时,音量被重置。

trans-unit.source: Set to 1 to require hardware acceleration, or 0 to force software render. By default, both are allowed.
trans-unit.target: 设置为1要求硬件加速,或0强制软件渲染。默认情况下,两者都允许。

trans-unit.source: Set to False to do monochrome rendering. This should provide a small speed gain and reduce cache memory size.
trans-unit.target: 设置为 False 进行单色渲染。这应该提供较小的速度增益并减小高速缓存的大小。

trans-unit.source: Set to True to add kerning between character pairs, if supported by the font, when positioning glyphs.
trans-unit.target: 设置为 True 可以在放置字形时在字符对之间添加字距调整（如果字体支持）。

trans-unit.source: Set to True to switch to a vertical text layout. The default is False, place horizontally.
trans-unit.target: 设置为 True 以切换到垂直文本布局。默认值为 False ，水平放置。

trans-unit.source: Sets all bits in the mask to 0.
trans-unit.target: 将掩码中的所有位设置为0。

trans-unit.source: Sets all bits in the mask to 1.
trans-unit.target: 将掩码中的所有位设置为1。

trans-unit.source: Sets all bits to 0
trans-unit.target: 将所有位设置为0

trans-unit.source: Sets all bits to 1
trans-unit.target: 将所有位数设为1

trans-unit.source: Sets coordinates x and y in place.
trans-unit.target: 设置坐标x和y的位置。

trans-unit.source: Sets coordinates x, y, and z in place.
trans-unit.target: 将坐标x、y、z设置到位。

trans-unit.source: Sets smoothscale acceleration. Takes a string argument. A value of 'GENERIC' turns off acceleration. 'MMX' uses MMX instructions only. 'SSE' allows SSE extensions as well. A value error is raised if type is not recognized or not supported by the current processor.
trans-unit.target: 设置平滑比例加速度。采用字符串参数。值“ GENERIC”将关闭加速。“ MMX” 仅使用 MMX 指令。'SSE'也允许 SSE 扩展。如果当前处理器无法识别或不支持类型，则会引发值错误。

trans-unit.source: Sets the OpenGL profile to one of these values:
trans-unit.target: 将OpenGL配置文件设置为这些值之一。

trans-unit.source: Sets the access mode for the clipboard. This is only of interest for X11 environments where clipboard modes pygame.SCRAP_SELECTION (for mouse selections) and pygame.SCRAP_CLIPBOARD (for the clipboard) are available. Setting the mode to pygame.SCRAP_SELECTION in other environments will not change the mode from pygame.SCRAP_CLIPBOARD.
trans-unit.target: 设置剪贴板的访问模式。这仅在剪贴板模式 pygame.SCRAP_SELECTION （用于鼠标选择）和 pygame.SCRAP_CLIPBOARD （用于剪贴板）可用的X11环境中才有意义。在其他环境中将模式设置为 pygame.SCRAP_SELECTION 不会从 pygame.SCRAP_CLIPBOARD 更改模式。

trans-unit.source: Sets the array system to be used for sound arrays
trans-unit.target: 设置用于声音阵列的阵列系统。

trans-unit.source: Sets the array system to be used for surface arrays
trans-unit.target: 设置用于表面阵列的阵列系统。

trans-unit.source: Sets the bit at the given position
trans-unit.target: 设置给定位置的位

trans-unit.source: Sets the clipboard access mode.
trans-unit.target: 设置剪贴板访问模式。

trans-unit.source: Sets the coordinates of the vector.
trans-unit.target: 设置向量的坐标。

trans-unit.source: Sets the number of available channels for the mixer. The default value is 8. The value can be increased or decreased. If the value is decreased, sounds playing on the truncated channels are stopped.
trans-unit.target: 设置混音器的可用通道数。默认值为8。 该值可以增加或减少。如果降低该值,则会停止在被截断的通道上播放的声音。

trans-unit.source: Sets the runtime icon the system will use to represent the display window. All windows default to a simple pygame logo for the window icon.
trans-unit.target: 设置系统将使用的运行时图标来表示显示窗口。所有窗口的图标都默认为一个简单的pygame标志。

trans-unit.source: Sets x and y from a polar coordinates tuple.
trans-unit.target: 从极坐标元组中设置x和y。

trans-unit.source: Sets x and y from a tuple (r, phi) where r is the radial distance, and phi is the azimuthal angle.
trans-unit.target: 从一个元组(r,phi)中设置x和y,其中r是径向距离,phi是方位角。

trans-unit.source: Sets x, y and z from a spherical coordinates 3-tuple.
trans-unit.target: 从球面坐标3元组中设置x、y和z。

trans-unit.source: Sets x, y and z from a tuple (r, theta, phi) where r is the radial distance, theta is the inclination angle and phi is the azimuthal angle.
trans-unit.target: 从一个元组(r,theta,phi)中设置x,y和z,其中r是径向距离,theta是倾角,phi是方位角。

trans-unit.source: Shift the surface image in place
trans-unit.target: 移动表面图像的位置

trans-unit.source: Shows whether or not smoothscale is using MMX or SSE acceleration. If no acceleration is available then "GENERIC" is returned. For a x86 processor the level of acceleration to use is determined at runtime.
trans-unit.target: 显示平滑缩放是否正在使用 MMX 或 SSE 加速。如果没有可用的加速度，则返回“ GENERIC”。对于x86处理器，要在运行时确定要使用的加速级别。

trans-unit.source: Shut down the underlying FreeType library.
trans-unit.target: 关闭底层FreeType库。

trans-unit.source: Similar to Clock.get_time(), but does not include any time used while Clock.tick() was delaying to limit the framerate.
trans-unit.target: 与 Clock.get_time() 类似，但不包括 Clock.tick() 延迟限制帧率时使用的任何时间。

trans-unit.source: Simple base class for visible game objects.
trans-unit.target: 可见游戏对象的简单基类。

trans-unit.source: Simple test if a sprite intersects anything in a group.
trans-unit.target: 简单测试一个精灵是否与一个组中的任何东西相交。

trans-unit.source: So far it looks like normal pygame.event is faster by up to two times. So maybe fastevent isn't fast at all.
trans-unit.target: 到目前为止，看起来像普通的 pygame.event 快了两倍。因此，fastevent可能根本不够快。

trans-unit.source: Some display environments have an option for automatically stretching all windows. When this option is enabled, this automatic stretching distorts the appearance of the pygame window. In the pygame examples directory, there is example code (prevent_display_stretching.py) which shows how to disable this automatic stretching of the pygame display on Microsoft Windows (Vista or newer required).
trans-unit.target: 一些显示环境有一个自动拉伸所有窗口的选项。当启用这个选项时,自动拉伸会扭曲 pygame 窗口的外观。在 pygame 的例子目录中,有一个例子代码 (prevent_display_stretching.py),它展示了如何在 Microsoft Windows (需要 Vista 或更新版本)中禁用 pygame 显示的自动拉伸。

trans-unit.source: Some general information about the Vector2 class.
trans-unit.target: 关于Vector2类的一些一般信息。

trans-unit.source: Some general information about the Vector3 class.
trans-unit.target: 关于Vector3类的一些一般信息。

trans-unit.source: Some of the transforms are considered destructive. These means every time they are performed they lose pixel data. Common examples of this are resizing and rotating. For this reason, it is better to re-transform the original surface than to keep transforming an image multiple times. (For example, suppose you are animating a bouncing spring which expands and contracts. If you applied the size changes incrementally to the previous images, you would lose detail. Instead, always begin with the original image and scale to the desired size.)
trans-unit.target: 有些变换被认为是破坏性的。这意味着每次执行这些变换都会丢失像素数据。常见的例子是调整大小和旋转。出于这个原因,重新变换原始表面比继续多次变换图像要好。(例如,假设您正在制作一个弹跳弹簧的动画,它将膨胀和收缩。如果您将尺寸变化逐步应用于之前的图像,您将失去细节。相反,总是从原始图像开始,然后缩放到所需的大小。)

trans-unit.source: Some platforms require the pygame.mixer module to be initialized after the display modules have initialized. The top level pygame.init() takes care of this automatically, but cannot pass any arguments to the mixer init. To solve this, mixer has a function pygame.mixer.pre_init() to set the proper defaults before the toplevel init is used.
trans-unit.target: 某些平台要求在初始化显示模块后初始化 pygame.mixer 模块。顶层 pygame.init() 自动处理此问题，但无法将任何参数传递给Mixer初始化。为了解决这个问题，mixer具有函数 pygame.mixer.pre_init() ,可以在使用顶层init之前设置适当的默认值。

trans-unit.source: Some scalable fonts include embedded bitmaps for particular point sizes. This property controls whether or not those bitmap strikes are used. Set it False to disable the loading of any bitmap strike. Set it True, the default, to permit bitmap strikes for a non-rotated render with no style other than wide or underline. This property is ignored for bitmap fonts.
trans-unit.target: 一些可缩放字体包括用于特定磅值的嵌入式位图。此属性控制是否使用这些位图标记。将其设置为 False 可禁用任何位图警示的加载。它集 True ，默认，允许位为打击非旋转比其他没有风格呈现 wide 或 underline 。位图字体将忽略此属性。

trans-unit.source: Some systems do not allow the window icon to change after it has been shown. This function can be called before pygame.display.set_mode() to create the icon before the display mode is set.
trans-unit.target: 某些系统不允许在显示窗口图标后对其进行更改。可以在 pygame.display.set_mode() 之前调用此函数，以在设置显示模式之前创建图标。

trans-unit.source: Sometimes the black and white color values will be split into two separate XBM files. You can pass a second maskfile argument to load the two images into a single cursor.
trans-unit.target: 有时，黑色和白色值会分成两个单独的 XBM 文件。您可以传递第二个maskfile参数，以将两个图像加载到单个光标中。

trans-unit.source: Sound data is made of thousands of samples per second, and each sample is the amplitude of the wave at a particular moment in time. For example, in 22-kHz format, element number 5 of the array is the amplitude of the wave after 5/22000 seconds.
trans-unit.target: 声音数据是由每秒数千个样本组成的,每个样本是波在特定时刻的振幅。例如,在22-kHz的格式中,阵列的第5号元素就是5/22000秒后的波幅。

trans-unit.source: Specific to surface_to_array, a ValueError is raised for target arrays with incorrect shape or item size. A TypeError is raised for an incorrect kind code. Surface specific problems, such as locking, raise a pygame.error.
trans-unit.target: 具体到surface_to_array,当目标数组的形状或项目大小不正确时,会引发ValueError。类型错误(TypeError)会因为不正确的类型代码而引发。特定的表面问题,如锁定,会引发一个pygame.error。

trans-unit.source: Sprites and Groups manage their relationships with the add() and remove() methods. These methods can accept a single or multiple targets for membership. The default initializers for these classes also takes a single or list of targets for initial membership. It is safe to repeatedly add and remove the same Sprite from a Group.
trans-unit.target: Sprite和Groups使用 add() 和 remove() 方法管理它们之间的关系。这些方法可以接受单个或多个目标成员资格。这些类的默认初始化器还采用单个或目标列表作为初始成员资格。从组中重复添加和删除相同的Sprite是安全的。

trans-unit.source: Sprites are not thread safe. So lock them yourself if using threads.
trans-unit.target: 精灵不是线程安全的。所以如果使用螺纹的话,要自己锁定它们。

trans-unit.source: Start receiving pygame.TEXTEDITING and pygame.TEXTINPUT events to handle IME.
trans-unit.target: 开始接收 pygame.TEXTEDITING 和 pygame.TEXTINPUT 事件以处理IME。

trans-unit.source: Start the playback of the music stream
trans-unit.target: 开始播放音乐流

trans-unit.source: Stop playback of a channel after fading out the sound over the given time argument in milliseconds.
trans-unit.target: 在给定的以毫秒为单位的时间参数上淡出声音后,停止一个通道的播放。

trans-unit.source: Stop receiving pygame.TEXTEDITING and pygame.TEXTINPUT events to handle IME.
trans-unit.target: 停止接收 pygame.TEXTEDITING 和 pygame.TEXTINPUT 事件来处理IME。

trans-unit.source: Stop sound playback on a channel. After playback is stopped the channel becomes available for new Sounds to play on it.
trans-unit.target: 停止一个频道的声音播放。停止播放后,该通道可供新的声音播放。

trans-unit.source: Stops playback of audio from the cdrom. This will also lose the current playback position. This method does nothing if the drive isn't already playing audio.
trans-unit.target: 停止播放光盘中的音频。这也将失去当前的播放位置。如果硬盘还没有在播放音频,这个方法不会有任何作用。

trans-unit.source: Stops recording, uninitializes the camera, and closes it. Once a camera is stopped, the below functions cannot be used until it is started again.
trans-unit.target: 停止记录,解除摄像机的初始化,并关闭摄像机。摄像机一旦停止,在再次启动之前不能使用以下功能。

trans-unit.source: Stops the music playback if it is currently playing.
trans-unit.target: 如果当前正在播放音乐,则停止音乐播放。

trans-unit.target: 下标切片也可以用来分配给目标PixelArray的矩形子视图。
