trans-unit.source: The input example shows how to translate midi input to pygame events.
trans-unit.target: 该输入示例展示了如何将midi输入转换为pygame事件。

trans-unit.source: The joystick module manages the joystick devices on a computer. Joystick devices include trackballs and video-game-style gamepads, and the module allows the use of multiple buttons and "hats". Computers may manage multiple joysticks at a time.
trans-unit.target: 操纵杆模块管理电脑上的操纵杆设备。操纵杆设备包括轨迹球和视频游戏风格的游戏手柄,该模块允许使用多个按钮和 "帽子"。计算机可以同时管理多个操纵杆。

trans-unit.source: The keyboard also has a list of modifier states that can be assembled by bitwise-ORing them together.
trans-unit.target: 键盘上还有一个修饰状态的列表,可以通过位臵ORing将它们组合在一起。

trans-unit.source: The kind argument is the length 1 string '0', '1', '2', '3', 'r', 'g', 'b', or 'a'. The letters are case insensitive; 'A' will work as well. The argument can be either a Unicode or byte (char) string. The default is '2'.
trans-unit.target: kind参数是长度为1的字符串'0'、'1'、'2'、'3'、'r'、'g'、'b'或'a'。字母不区分大小写,'A'也可以。参数可以是Unicode或字节(char)字符串。默认值是'2'。

trans-unit.source: The layers number must exist, it is not checked.
trans-unit.target: 层数必须存在,不检查。

trans-unit.source: The length of each array dimension as a tuple of integers. The length of the tuple is the number of dimensions in the array.
trans-unit.target: 每个数组维数的长度是一个整数元组。整数组的长度是数组中的维数。

trans-unit.source: The linked and compile version numbers should be the same.
trans-unit.target: 链接和编译的版本号应该是一样的。

trans-unit.source: The list contains tuples for each character, which contain the minimum X offset, the maximum X offset, the minimum Y offset, the maximum Y offset and the advance offset (bearing plus width) of the character. [(minx, maxx, miny, maxy, advance), (minx, maxx, miny, maxy, advance), ...]. None is entered in the list for each unrecognized character.
trans-unit.target: 该列表包含每个字符的元组，其中包含该字符的最小 X 偏移，最大 X 偏移，最小 Y 偏移，最大 Y 偏移和前进偏移（轴承加宽度）。[（minx，maxx，miny，maxy，advanced），（minx，maxx，miny，maxy，advanced），...]。列表中没有为每个无法识别的字符输入任何内容。

trans-unit.source: The loops argument controls how many times the sample will be repeated after being played the first time. A value of 5 means that the sound will be played once, then repeated five times, and so is played a total of six times. The default value (zero) means the Sound is not repeated, and so is only played once. If loops is set to -1 the Sound will loop indefinitely (though you can still call stop() to stop it).
trans-unit.target: loops参数控制第一次播放后样本将重复多少次。值为5表示声音将被播放一次，然后重复播放五次，因此总共播放了六次。默认值（零）表示不重复播放声音，因此仅播放一次。如果将loops设置为-1，则Sound会无限循环（尽管您仍然可以调用 stop() 来停止它）。

trans-unit.source: The loops argument controls the number of repeats a music will play. play(5) will cause the music to played once, then repeated five times, for a total of six. If the loops is -1 then the music will repeat indefinitely.
trans-unit.target: loops参数控制音乐将播放的重复次数。 play(5) 将使音乐播放一次，然后重复播放五次，总共播放六次。如果循环为-1，则音乐将无限期重复。

trans-unit.source: The loops argument has the same meaning as in Sound.play(): it is the number of times to repeat the sound after the first time. If it is 3, the sound will be played 4 times (the first time, then three more). If loops is -1 then the playback will repeat indefinitely.
trans-unit.target: loops参数的含义与 Sound.play() 中的含义相同：这是第一次后重复声音的次数。如果为3，则声音将播放4次（第一次，然后再播放3次）。如果循环为-1，则播放将无限期重复。

trans-unit.source: The maxtime argument can be used to stop playback after a given number of milliseconds.
trans-unit.target: maxtime参数可以用来在给定的毫秒数之后停止播放。

trans-unit.source: The methods overlap(), overlap_area(), overlap_mask(), draw(), erase(), and convolve() use an offset parameter to indicate the offset of another mask's top left corner from the calling mask's top left corner. The calling mask's top left corner is considered to be the origin (0, 0). Offsets are a tuple or list of 2 integer values (x_offset, y_offset). Positive and negative offset values are supported.
trans-unit.target: 方法 overlap_area() overlap() ，overlay_area（）， overlap_mask() ， draw() ， erase() 和 convolve() 使用offset参数来指示另一个蒙版的左上角与调用蒙版的左上角的偏移量。呼叫掩码的左上角被认为是原点 (0, 0) 。偏移量是2个整数值 (x_offset, y_offset) 的元组或列表。支持正负偏移值。

trans-unit.source: The metrics are adjusted for the current rotation, strong, and oblique settings.
trans-unit.target: 对当前的旋转、强力、斜面设置进行指标调整。

trans-unit.source: The midi module can send output to midi devices and get input from midi devices. It can also list midi devices on the system.
trans-unit.target: midi模块可以向midi设备发送输出,也可以从midi设备获取输入。它还可以列出系统中的midi设备。

trans-unit.source: The midi module supports real and virtual midi devices.
trans-unit.target: midi模块支持真实和虚拟的midi设备。

trans-unit.source: The mixer also has a special streaming channel. This is for music playback and is accessed through the pygame.mixer.music module.
trans-unit.target: 混音器还具有特殊的流媒体频道。这用于音乐播放，可通过 pygame.mixer.music 模块进行访问。

trans-unit.source: The mixer can reserve any number of channels that will not be automatically selected for playback by Sounds. If sounds are currently playing on the reserved channels they will not be stopped.
trans-unit.target: 混音器可以保留任何数量的通道,这些通道不会被声音自动选择播放。如果声音正在被保留的通道上播放,它们将不会被停止。

trans-unit.source: The mixer module has a limited number of channels for playback of sounds. Usually programs tell pygame to start playing audio and it selects an available channel automatically. The default is 8 simultaneous channels, but complex programs can get more precise control over the number of channels and their use.
trans-unit.target: 混音器模块有有限的通道用于播放声音。通常程序告诉 pygame 开始播放音频,它会自动选择一个可用的通道。默认是8个通道同时播放,但复杂的程序可以更精确地控制通道的数量和使用。

trans-unit.source: The mixer module must be initialized like other pygame modules, but it has some extra conditions. The pygame.mixer.init() function takes several optional arguments to control the playback rate and sample size. Pygame will default to reasonable values, but pygame cannot perform Sound resampling, so the mixer should be initialized to match the values of your audio resources.
trans-unit.target: 混合器模块必须像其他pygame模块一样被初始化，但是它有一些额外的条件。所述 pygame.mixer.init() 函数需要几个可选参数来控制回放速率和样本大小。 Pygame将默认设置为合理的值，但是pygame无法执行声音重采样，因此应将混音器初始化为与音频资源的值匹配。

trans-unit.source: The module includes several standard cursors. The pygame.mouse.set_cursor() function takes several arguments. All those arguments have been stored in a single tuple you can call like this:
trans-unit.target: 该模块包括几个标准游标。该 pygame.mouse.set_cursor() 函数有几个参数。所有这些参数都存储在一个元组中，您可以这样调用：

trans-unit.source: The most useful flags to pass will be pygame.HWSURFACE, pygame.DOUBLEBUF, and maybe pygame.FULLSCREEN. The function will return 0 if these display flags cannot be set.
trans-unit.target: 要传递的最有用的标志是 pygame.HWSURFACE ， pygame.DOUBLEBUF 以及 pygame.FULLSCREEN 。如果无法设置这些显示标志，则该函数将返回0。

trans-unit.source: The mouse functions can be used to get the current state of the mouse device. These functions can also alter the system cursor for the mouse.
trans-unit.target: 鼠标功能可以用来获取鼠标设备的当前状态。这些功能还可以改变鼠标的系统光标。

trans-unit.source: The music module is closely tied to pygame.mixer. Use the music module to control the playback of music in the sound mixer.
trans-unit.target: 音乐模块与 pygame.mixer 紧密相关。使用音乐模块控制混音器中音乐的播放。

trans-unit.source: The new Surface will inherit the palette, color key, and alpha settings from its parent.
trans-unit.target: 新的Surface将继承其母公司的调色板、色键和alpha设置。

trans-unit.source: The new copy will have the same class as the copied surface. This lets as Surface subclass inherit this method without the need to override, unless subclass specific instance attributes also need copying.
trans-unit.target: 新的副本将与被复制的曲面具有相同的类。这让作为Surface子类继承这个方法而不需要覆盖,除非子类特定的实例属性也需要复制。

trans-unit.source: The next operation will be performed elementwise.
trans-unit.target: 接下来的操作将按元素进行。

trans-unit.source: The number of milliseconds that passed between the previous two calls to Clock.tick().
trans-unit.target: 在前两次对 Clock.tick() 的调用之间经过的毫秒数。

trans-unit.source: The number of pixels that are within the 'threshold' in 'surf' compared to either 'search_color' or
trans-unit.target: 与 "search_color "或 "surf "相比,"surf "中在 "阈值 "内的像素数。

trans-unit.source: The number of the first device with a substring that matches the string exactly is returned. For example, if the string in the registry is "USB" and device 1 is named "In USB MidiSport 1x1", then that will be the default input because it contains the string "USB".
trans-unit.target: 返回具有与字符串完全匹配的子串的第一个设备的编号。例如,如果注册表中的字符串是 "USB",而设备1被命名为 "In USB MidiSport 1x1",那么这将是默认的输入,因为它包含字符串 "USB"。

trans-unit.source: The number of valid bytes of data exported. For discontinuous data, that is data which is not a single block of memory, the bytes within the gaps are excluded from the count. This property is equivalent to the Py_buffer C struct len field.
trans-unit.target: 导出的有效数据字节数。对于不连续的数据，即不是单个内存块的数据，间隙内的字节将从计数中排除。此属性等效于 Py_buffer C struct len 字段。

trans-unit.source: The oblique style is only supported for scalable (outline) fonts. An attempt to set this style on a bitmap font will raise an AttributeError. If the font object is inactive, as returned by Font.__new__(), setting this property raises a RuntimeError.
trans-unit.target: 仅可缩放（轮廓）字体支持倾斜样式。尝试在位图字体上设置此样式将引发AttributeError。如果Font对象是非活动的（如 Font.__new__() 返回的那样），则设置此属性将引发RuntimeError。

trans-unit.source: The optional resolution argument sets the pixel size, in dots per inch, for use in scaling glyphs for this Font instance. If 0 then the default module value, set by init(), is used. The Font object's resolution can only be changed by re-initializing the Font instance.
trans-unit.target: 可选的resolution参数设置像素大小，以每英寸点数为单位，用于缩放此Font实例的字形。如果为0 ，则使用由 init() 设置的默认模块值。只能通过重新初始化Font实例来更改Font对象的分辨率。

trans-unit.source: The optional ucs4 argument, an integer, sets the default text translation mode: 0 (False) recognize UTF-16 surrogate pairs, any other value (True), to treat Unicode text as UCS-4, with no surrogate pairs. See Font.ucs4.
trans-unit.target: 可选的ucs4参数（整数）设置默认的文本转换模式：0（False）识别UTF-16代理对，任何其他值（True），将没有代理对的Unicode文本视为UCS-4。参见 Font.ucs4 。

trans-unit.source: The optional flags argument can be set to pygame.RLEACCEL to provide better performance on non accelerated displays. An RLEACCEL Surface will be slower to modify, but quicker to blit as a source.
trans-unit.target: 可选的flags参数可以设置为 pygame.RLEACCEL ,以在非加速显示上提供更好的性能。 RLEACCEL 曲面的修改速度较慢，但​​将其作为源进行渲染的速度更快。

trans-unit.source: The origin of the display, where x = 0 and y = 0, is the top left of the screen. Both axes increase positively towards the bottom right of the screen.
trans-unit.target: 显示的原点,其中x=0,y=0,是屏幕的左上方。两个轴都向屏幕右下角正向增加。

trans-unit.source: The output example shows how to translate mouse clicks or computer keyboard events into midi notes. It implements a rudimentary button widget and state machine.
trans-unit.target: 该输出示例展示了如何将鼠标点击或计算机键盘事件转化为midi音符。它实现了一个基本的按钮部件和状态机。

trans-unit.source: The overlay objects are always visible, and always show above the regular display contents.
trans-unit.target: 覆盖对象总是可见的,并且总是显示在常规显示内容之上。

trans-unit.source: The physical buffer start address and a read-only flag as a length 2 tuple. The address is an integer value, while the read-only flag is a bool—False for writable, True for read-only.
trans-unit.target: 物理缓冲区的起始地址和一个只读标志（长度为2个元组）。地址是一个整数值，而只读标志是bool- False 可写， True 为只读。

trans-unit.source: The pixel format can be controlled by passing the bit depth or an existing Surface. The flags argument is a bitmask of additional features for the surface. You can pass any combination of these flags:
trans-unit.target: 可以通过传递位元深度或现有的曲面来控制像素格式。标志参数是曲面的附加特征的位掩码。您可以传递这些标志的任意组合。

trans-unit.source: The pygame display can actually be initialized in one of several modes. By default, the display is a basic software driven framebuffer. You can request special modules like hardware acceleration and OpenGL support. These are controlled by flags passed to pygame.display.set_mode().
trans-unit.target: pygame显示实际上可以在几种模式之一中初始化。默认情况下，显示是基本的软件驱动的帧缓冲区。您可以请求特殊模块，例如硬件加速和OpenGL支持。这些由传递给 pygame.display.set_mode() 的标志控制。

trans-unit.source: The pygame math module currently provides Vector classes in two and three dimensions, Vector2 and Vector3 respectively.
trans-unit.target: pygame数学模块目前提供了二维和三维的Vector类,分别是Vector2和Vector3。

trans-unit.source: The pygame package does not import freetype automatically when loaded. This module must be imported explicitly to be used.
trans-unit.target: pygame软件包在加载时不会自动导入 freetype 。必须明确导入此模块才能使用。

trans-unit.source: The pygame package represents the top-level package for others to use. Pygame itself is broken into many submodules, but this does not affect programs that use pygame.
trans-unit.target: pygame包代表了顶级包,供他人使用。Pygame本身被分解成许多子模块,但这并不影响使用pygame的程序。

trans-unit.source: The pygame.gfxdraw module differs from the draw module in the API it uses, and also the different functions available to draw. It also wraps the primitives from the library called SDL_gfx, rather than using modified versions.
trans-unit.target: pygame.gfxdraw 模块与 draw 模块的不同之处在于它所使用的 API,以及可用于绘制的不同函数。它还封装了名为SDL_gfx的库中的基元,而不是使用修改后的版本。

trans-unit.source: The red value of the Color.
trans-unit.target: 颜色的红色值。

trans-unit.source: The return rectangle is the area of the affected pixels, excluding any pixels outside the destination Surface, or outside the clipping area.
trans-unit.target: 返回的矩形是受影响像素的区域,不包括目标Surface之外的任何像素,或剪裁区域之外的像素。

trans-unit.source: The return value cursor_args can be passed directly to the pygame.mouse.set_cursor() function.
trans-unit.target: 返回值cursor_args可以直接传递给 pygame.mouse.set_cursor() 函数。

trans-unit.source: The return value is a rectangle giving the size and position of the rendered text within the surface.
trans-unit.target: 返回值是一个矩形,给出了渲染文字在表面的大小和位置。

trans-unit.source: The return value is a tuple: the new surface and the bounding rectangle giving the size and origin of the rendered text.
trans-unit.target: 返回值是一个元组:新的曲面和边界矩形,给出渲染文本的大小和原点。

trans-unit.source: The returned Rect list should be passed to pygame.display.update(). This will help performance on software driven display modes. This type of updating is usually only helpful on destinations with non-animating backgrounds.
trans-unit.target: 返回的Rect列表应传递给 pygame.display.update() 。这将有助于软件驱动的显示模式下的性能。此类更新通常仅对具有非动画背景的目标有用。

trans-unit.source: The returned Surface will contain the same color format, colorkey and alpha transparency as the file it came from. You will often want to call Surface.convert() with no arguments, to create a copy that will draw more quickly on the screen.
trans-unit.target: 返回的Surface将包含与其来源的文件相同的颜色格式，colorkey和alpha透明度。您通常会希望不带任何参数调用 Surface.convert() ，以创建一个副本，以便在屏幕上更快地绘制。

trans-unit.source: The same as the Rect.unionall() method, but operates in place.
trans-unit.target: 与 Rect.unionall() 方法相同，但在适当位置运行。

trans-unit.source: The scaled ascent of the font in pixels
trans-unit.target: 以像素为单位的字体比例上升。

trans-unit.source: The scaled bounding box height of the font in pixels
trans-unit.target: 字体的边框高度,单位为像素。

trans-unit.source: The scaled descent of the font in pixels
trans-unit.target: 字体的比例下降,单位为像素。

trans-unit.source: The scaled height of the font in pixels
trans-unit.target: 字体的缩放高度(像素)。

trans-unit.source: The scrap module is currently only supported for Windows, X11 and Mac OS X. On Mac OS X only text works at the moment - other types may be supported in future releases.
trans-unit.target: Scrap模块目前只支持Windows、X11和Mac OS X。在Mac OS X上,目前只支持文本,其他类型的文本可能会在未来的版本中被支持。

trans-unit.source: The scrap module is for transferring data to/from the clipboard. This allows for cutting and pasting data between pygame and other applications. Some basic data (MIME) types are defined and registered:
trans-unit.target: 剪贴板模块用于向剪贴板传输数据。这允许在pygame和其他应用程序之间剪切和粘贴数据。一些基本的数据(MIME)类型被定义和注册。

trans-unit.source: The scrap module requires pygame.display.set_mode() be called before being initialized.
trans-unit.target: scrap模块需要在初始化之前调用 pygame.display.set_mode() 。

trans-unit.source: The size and format image must compute the exact same size as the passed string buffer. Otherwise an exception will be raised.
trans-unit.target: 大小和格式图像必须计算出与传递的字符串缓冲区完全相同的大小。否则将引发一个异常。

trans-unit.source: The size argument is a pair of numbers representing the width and height. The flags argument is a collection of additional options. The depth argument represents the number of bits to use for color.
trans-unit.target: 大小参数是一对数字,代表宽度和高度。标志参数是一个附加选项的集合。深度参数代表用于颜色的位数。

trans-unit.source: The size argument represents how many bits are used for each audio sample. If the value is negative then signed sample values will be used. Positive values mean unsigned audio samples will be used. An invalid value raises an exception.
trans-unit.target: 大小参数表示每个音频样本使用多少位。如果该值为负数,那么将使用有符号的样本值。正值意味着将使用无符号音频样本。无效的值会引发一个异常。

trans-unit.source: The size, in bytes, of the exported buffer.
trans-unit.target: 输出缓冲区的大小,以字节为单位。

trans-unit.source: The starting address of the surface's raw pixel bytes.
trans-unit.target: 表面的原始像素字节的起始地址。

trans-unit.source: The starting position argument controls where in the music the song starts playing. The starting position is dependent on the format of music playing. MP3 and OGG use the position as time (in seconds). MOD music it is the pattern order number. Passing a startpos will raise a NotImplementedError if it cannot set the start position
trans-unit.target: 开始位置参数控制歌曲在音乐中开始播放的位置。起始位置取决于音乐播放的格式。 MP3 和 OGG 使用位置作为时间（以秒为单位）。 MOD 音乐是图案订单号。如果无法设置起始位置，则传递startpos会引发NotImplementedError

trans-unit.source: The state of the font's oblique style flag
trans-unit.target: 字体的斜体标志的状态。

trans-unit.source: The state of the font's strong style flag
trans-unit.target: 字体的强势风格标志的状态。

trans-unit.source: The state of the font's underline style flag
trans-unit.target: 字体的下划线样式标志的状态。

trans-unit.source: The state of the font's wide style flag
trans-unit.target: 字体的宽体旗帜的状态。

trans-unit.source: The strength associated with the strong or wide font styles
trans-unit.target: 与强势或宽体字风格相关的强度。

trans-unit.source: The strength style is only supported for scalable (outline) fonts. An attempt to set this property on a bitmap font will raise an AttributeError. If the font object is inactive, as returned by Font.__new__(), assignment to this property raises a RuntimeError.
trans-unit.target: 仅可缩放（轮廓）字体支持强度样式。尝试在位图字体上设置此属性将引发AttributeError。如果Font对象是非活动的（如 Font.__new__() 返回的那样），则对此属性的赋值将引发RuntimeError。

trans-unit.source: The strings are not validated, and improperly sized strings could crash the program.
trans-unit.target: 字符串未被验证,大小不合适的字符串可能会使程序崩溃。

trans-unit.source: The surface is locked only when an exposed interface is accessed. For new buffer interface accesses, the surface is unlocked once the last buffer view is released. For array interface and old buffer interface accesses, the surface remains locked until the BufferProxy object is released.
trans-unit.target: 只有在访问暴露的接口时,表面才会被锁定。对于新的缓冲区接口访问,一旦最后一个缓冲区视图被释放,表面就会被解锁。对于数组接口和旧缓冲区接口的访问,表面一直保持锁定状态,直到BufferProxy对象被释放。

trans-unit.source: The surface_to_array function copies pixels from a Surface object to a 2D or 3D array. Depending on argument kind and the target array dimension, a copy may be raw pixel value, RGB, a color component slice, or colorkey alpha transparency value. Recognized kind values are the single character codes 'P', 'R', 'G', 'B', 'A', and 'C'. Kind codes are case insensitive, so 'p' is equivalent to 'P'. The first two dimensions of the target must be the surface size (w, h).
trans-unit.target: surface_to_array函数将像素从Surface对象复制到2D或3D数组。根据参数 kind 和目标数组尺寸，副本可以是原始像素值，RGB，颜色分量切片或colorkey alpha透明度值。公认的 kind 值是单个字符代码“ P”，“ R”，“ G”，“ B”，“ A”和“ C”。种类代码不区分大小写，因此“ p”等效于“ P”。目标的前两个尺寸必须是表面尺寸（w，h）。

trans-unit.source: The text can only be a single line: newline characters are not rendered. Null characters ('x00') raise a TypeError. Both Unicode and char (byte) strings are accepted. For Unicode strings only UCS-2 characters ('u0001' to 'uFFFF') are recognized. Anything greater raises a UnicodeError. For char strings a LATIN1 encoding is assumed. The antialias argument is a boolean: if true the characters will have smooth edges. The color argument is the color of the text [e.g.: (0,0,255) for blue]. The optional background argument is a color to use for the text background. If no background is passed the area outside the text will be transparent.
trans-unit.target: 文本只能是一行：不显示换行符。空字符（'x00'）引发TypeError。Unicode和char（字节）字符串都可以接受。对于Unicode字符串，只能识别UCS-2字符（“ u0001”至“ uFFFF”）。任何更大的值都会引发UnicodeError。对于char字符串，假定为 LATIN1 编码。antialias参数是一个布尔值：如果为true，则字符将具有平滑的边缘。color参数是文本的颜色[例如：（0,0,255）为蓝色]。可选的背景参数是用于文本背景的颜色。如果没有背景通过，则文本外部的区域将是透明的。

trans-unit.source: The time is reset to 0 when the pygame.midi module is initialized.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 pygame.midi 模块时，该时间将重置为0 。

trans-unit.source: The two angle arguments are given in radians and indicate the start and stop positions of the arc. The arc is drawn in a counterclockwise direction from the start_angle to the stop_angle.
trans-unit.target: 两个角度自变量以弧度表示，指示圆弧的开始和停止位置。弧从 start_angle 到 stop_angle 沿逆时针方向绘制。

trans-unit.source: The type argument will be the event id sent to the queue. This can be any valid event type, but a good choice would be a value between pygame.locals.USEREVENT and pygame.locals.NUMEVENTS. If no type argument is given then the Channel will stop sending endevents.
trans-unit.target: type参数将是发送到队列的事件ID。这可以是任何有效的事件类型，但是最好的选择是 pygame.locals.USEREVENT 和 pygame.locals.NUMEVENTS 之间的值。如果未提供类型参数，则Channel将停止发送结束事件。

trans-unit.source: The unscaled ascent of the font in font units
trans-unit.target: 以字体单位为单位的未缩放的字体上升幅度。

trans-unit.source: The unscaled descent of the font in font units
trans-unit.target: 以字体单位为单位的字体不按比例下降。

trans-unit.source: The unscaled height of the font in font units
trans-unit.target: 字体的未缩放高度,单位为字体。

trans-unit.source: The user should first determine the available device ID by using the supplied application "testin" or "testout".
trans-unit.target: 用户应首先通过使用提供的应用程序 "testin "或 "testout "来确定可用的设备ID。

trans-unit.source: The width and height arguments control the size for the overlay image data. The overlay image can be displayed at any size, not just the resolution of the overlay.
trans-unit.target: 宽度和高度参数控制叠加图像数据的大小。叠加图像可以以任何尺寸显示,而不仅仅是叠加的分辨率。

trans-unit.source: The width of the strings must all be equal and be divisible by 8. An example set of cursor strings looks like this
trans-unit.target: 字符串的宽度必须是相等的,并且可以被8整除,一个游标字符串的例子是这样的。

trans-unit.source: The xxxx_test submodules of the tests package are unit test suites for individual parts of pygame. Each can also be run as a main program. This is useful if the test, such as cdrom_test, is interactive.
trans-unit.target: 测试包中的xxxx_test子模块是pygame各个部分的单元测试套件。每个子模块也可以作为主程序运行。如果测试(如cdrom_test)是交互式的,这就很有用。

trans-unit.source: There are important things that must be dealt with internally in the event queue. The main window may need to be repainted or respond to the system. If you fail to make a call to the event queue for too long, the system may decide your program has locked up.
trans-unit.target: 在事件队列中,有一些重要的事情必须在内部处理。主窗口可能需要重新绘制或响应系统。如果你太久没有对事件队列进行调用,系统可能会判定你的程序已经锁定。

trans-unit.source: There are many keyboard constants, they are used to represent keys on the keyboard. The following is a list of all keyboard constants:
trans-unit.target: 有许多键盘常量,它们用来代表键盘上的按键。下面是所有键盘常量的列表。

trans-unit.source: There are several collision tests between other rectangles. Most python containers can be searched for collisions against a single Rect.
trans-unit.target: 有几个其他矩形之间的碰撞测试。大多数 python 容器都可以对单个 Rect 进行碰撞搜索。

trans-unit.source: There are several ways to run the examples. First they can be run as stand-alone programs. Second they can be imported and their main() methods called (see below). Finally, the easiest way is to use the python -m option:
trans-unit.target: 有几种方法可以运行示例。首先，它们可以作为独立程序运行。其次，可以导入它们并调用其 main() 方法（请参见下文）。最后，最简单的方法是使用python -m选项：

trans-unit.source: There are three types of transparency supported in pygame: colorkeys, surface alphas, and pixel alphas. Surface alphas can be mixed with colorkeys, but an image with per pixel alphas cannot use the other modes. Colorkey transparency makes a single color value transparent. Any pixels matching the colorkey will not be drawn. The surface alpha value is a single value that changes the transparency for the entire image. A surface alpha of 255 is opaque, and a value of 0 is completely transparent.
trans-unit.target: pygame中支持的透明度有三种:colorkeys、surface alphass和pixel alphass。Surface alphass可以和colorkeys混合使用,但使用per pixel alphass的图像不能使用其他模式。colorkey透明度可以使一个颜色值透明。任何与颜色键匹配的像素都不会被绘制。表面alpha值是改变整个图像透明度的单一值。表面阿尔法值为255则不透明,值为0则完全透明。

trans-unit.source: There is a special property, GroupSingle.sprite, that accesses the Sprite that this Group contains. It can be None when the Group is empty. The property can also be assigned to add a Sprite into the GroupSingle container.
trans-unit.target: 有一个特殊属性 GroupSingle.sprite ，用于访问该Group包含的Sprite。当组为空时，可以为无。还可以分配该属性以将Sprite添加到GroupSingle容器中。

trans-unit.source: There is no need to use this method if not using the convenience method by the same name in the Group class.
trans-unit.target: 如果不使用Group类中同名的方便方法,就没有必要使用这个方法。

trans-unit.source: There is no way to get the return value from the Sprite.update() methods.
trans-unit.target: 无法从 Sprite.update() 方法获取返回值。

trans-unit.source: There is support for pixel access for the Surfaces. Pixel access on hardware surfaces is slow and not recommended. Pixels can be accessed using the get_at() and set_at() functions. These methods are fine for simple access, but will be considerably slow when doing of pixel work with them. If you plan on doing a lot of pixel level work, it is recommended to use a pygame.PixelArray, which gives an array like view of the surface. For involved mathematical manipulations try the pygame.surfarray module (It's quite quick, but requires NumPy.)
trans-unit.target: 支持对Surface的像素访问。硬件表面上的像素访问很慢，因此不建议这样做。可以使用 get_at() 和 set_at() 函数访问像素。这些方法适合简单访问，但是与它们一起进行像素处理时会非常慢。如果您打算做很多像素级的工作，建议使用 pygame.PixelArray ，它可以提供类似于表面视图的阵列。对于涉及的数学操作，请尝试 pygame.surfarray 模块（这非常快，但是需要NumPy。）

trans-unit.source: There may be a brief pause while the drive is initialized. Avoid CD.init() if the program should not stop for a second or two.
trans-unit.target: 初始化驱动器时可能会有短暂的暂停。如果程序不应停止一两秒钟，请避免使用 CD.init() 。

trans-unit.source: These constants may be found on the FreeType constants module. Optionally, the default style can be modified or obtained accessing the individual style attributes (underline, oblique, strong).
trans-unit.target: 这些常量可以在FreeType常量模块中找到。可以选择修改默认样式,或者通过访问单个样式属性(下划线、斜线、强)获得默认样式。

trans-unit.source: These examples should help get you started with pygame. Here is a brief rundown of what you get. The source code for these examples is in the public domain. Feel free to use for your own projects.
trans-unit.target: 这些例子应该可以帮助你开始使用pygame。下面是一个简单的概述。这些例子的源代码是在公共领域。欢迎在你自己的项目中使用。

trans-unit.source: These functions temporarily lock the surface they are operating on. Many sequential drawing calls can be sped up by locking and unlocking the surface object around the draw calls (see pygame.Surface.lock() and pygame.Surface.unlock()).
trans-unit.target: 这些功能会暂时锁定正在操作的表面。通过锁定和解锁绘制调用周围的表面对象，可以加快许多顺序的绘制调用的速度（请参阅 pygame.Surface.lock() 和 pygame.Surface.unlock() ）。

trans-unit.source: They support the following numerical operations: vec+vec, vec-vec, vec*number, number*vec, vec/number, vec//number, vec+=vec, vec-=vec, vec*=number, vec/=number, vec//=number. All these operations will be performed elementwise. In addition vec*vec will perform a scalar-product (a.k.a. dot-product). If you want to multiply every element from vector v with every element from vector w you can use the elementwise method: v.elementwise() * w
trans-unit.target: 它们支持以下数值运算：vec + vec，vec-vec，vec * number，number * vec，vec / number，vec // number，vec + = vec，vec- = vec，vec * = number，vec / = number ，vec // =数字。所有这些操作将按元素进行。另外，vec * vec将执行标量积（aka点积）。如果要将向量v中的每个元素与向量w中的每个元素相乘，可以使用elementwise方法： v.elementwise() * w

trans-unit.source: This pygame.masks demo will display multiple moving sprites bouncing off each other. More than one sprite image can be provided.
trans-unit.target: 这个 pygame.masks 演示将显示多个移动的精灵，它们会相互反弹。可以提供一个以上的子画面图像。

trans-unit.source: This allows the application to reserve a specific number of channels for important sounds that must not be dropped or have a guaranteed channel to play on.
trans-unit.target: 这允许应用程序为重要的声音保留特定数量的通道,不得丢弃或有保证的通道播放。

trans-unit.source: This call cannot be used on pygame.OPENGL displays and will generate an exception.
trans-unit.target: 该调用不能在 pygame.OPENGL 显示上使用，并且会生成异常。

trans-unit.source: This can be useful for collision detection. An approximate collision normal can be found by calculating the gradient of the overlapping area through the finite difference.
trans-unit.target: 这对碰撞检测很有用。通过有限差值计算重叠区域的梯度,可以找到一个近似的碰撞法线。

trans-unit.source: This can flip a Surface either vertically, horizontally, or both. Flipping a Surface is non-destructive and returns a new Surface with the same dimensions.
trans-unit.target: 此功能可以垂直、水平或同时翻转一个曲面。翻转曲面是非破坏性的,并返回一个具有相同尺寸的新曲面。

trans-unit.source: This can only work on 24-bit or 32-bit Surfaces.
trans-unit.target: 这只适用于24位或32位的Surface。

trans-unit.source: This can only work on 32-bit Surfaces with a per-pixel alpha value.
trans-unit.target: 这只能在32位的Surface上使用每像素的alpha值。

trans-unit.source: This causes pygame to signal (by means of the event queue) when the music is done playing. The argument determines the type of event that will be queued.
trans-unit.target: 这将使 pygame 在音乐播放完毕时发出信号(通过事件队列)。参数决定将被排队的事件类型。

trans-unit.source: This class derives from pygame.sprite.RenderUpdates(). It maintains the order in which the Sprites were added to the Group for rendering. This makes adding and removing Sprites from the Group a little slower than regular Groups.
trans-unit.target: 此类从 pygame.sprite.RenderUpdates() 派生。它保持将精灵添加到组以进行渲染的顺序。这使得从组中添加和删除Sprite的速度比常规组慢一些。

trans-unit.source: This class is an alias to pygame.sprite.Group(). It has no additional functionality.
trans-unit.target: 此类是 pygame.sprite.Group() 的别名。它没有其他功能。

trans-unit.source: This class is derived from pygame.sprite.Group(). It has an extended draw() method that tracks the changed areas of the screen.
trans-unit.target: 此类从 pygame.sprite.Group() 派生。它具有扩展的 draw() 方法，该方法可跟踪屏幕的更改区域。

trans-unit.source: This closes resources like files for any music that may be loaded.
trans-unit.target: 这将关闭任何可能加载的音乐文件等资源。

trans-unit.source: This creates a new Surface with the specified text rendered on it. pygame provides no way to directly draw text on an existing Surface: instead you must use Font.render() to create an image (Surface) of the text, then blit this image onto another Surface.
trans-unit.target: 这将创建一个新的Surface，上面带有指定的文本。pygame没有提供直接在现有Surface上绘制文本的方法：相反，您必须使用 Font.render() 创建文本的图像（Surface），然后将此图像着色到另一个Surface上。

trans-unit.source: This cursors module contains functions for loading and decoding various cursor formats. These allow you to easily store your cursors in external files or directly as encoded python strings.
trans-unit.target: cursors模块包含了加载和解码各种游标格式的功能。这些函数允许你轻松地将游标存储在外部文件中,或者直接作为编码的python字符串。

trans-unit.source: This example shows a scrollable image that has a zoom factor of eight. It uses the Surface.scroll() function to shift the image on the display surface. A clip rectangle protects a margin area. If called as a function, the example accepts an optional image file path. If run as a program it takes an optional file path command line argument. If no file is provided a default image file is used.
trans-unit.target: 本示例显示了缩放系数为8的可滚动图像。它使用 Surface.scroll() 函数在显示表面上移动图像。剪辑矩形保护边缘区域。如果作为函数调用，则该示例接受可选的图像文件路径。如果作为程序运行，它将采用可选的文件路径命令行参数。如果未提供文件，则使用默认图像文件。

trans-unit.source: This example was created in a quick comparison with the BlitzBasic gaming language. Nonetheless, it demonstrates a quick 8-bit setup (with colormap).
trans-unit.target: 这个例子是在与BlitzBasic游戏语言的快速比较中创建的。尽管如此,它还是演示了一个快速的8位设置(带colormap)。

trans-unit.source: This exception is raised whenever a pygame or SDL operation fails. You can catch any anticipated problems and deal with the error. The exception is always raised with a descriptive message about the problem.
trans-unit.target: 每当 pygame 或 SDL 操作失败时,就会引发这个异常。你可以抓住任何预期的问题并处理错误。异常的发生总是带有关于问题的描述性信息。

trans-unit.source: This function can only be called once per Python session. It is not reentrant.
trans-unit.target: 这个函数在每个 Python 会话中只能被调用一次。它不是重入式的。

trans-unit.source: This function closes the freetype module. After calling this function, you should not invoke any class, method or function related to the freetype module as they are likely to fail or might give unpredictable results. It is safe to call this function even if the module hasn't been initialized yet.
trans-unit.target: 此功能关闭 freetype 模块。调用此函数后，您不应调用与 freetype 模块相关的任何类，方法或函数，因为它们可能会失败或可能产生不可预测的结果。即使模块尚未初始化，也可以安全地调用此函数。

trans-unit.source: This function has no effect on a Surface with more than 8-bits per pixel.
trans-unit.target: 此功能对每个像素超过8位的Surface没有影响。

trans-unit.source: This function initializes the underlying FreeType library and must be called before trying to use any of the functionality of the freetype module.
trans-unit.target: 此函数初始化基础的FreeType库，并且在尝试使用 freetype 模块的任何功能之前必须先调用此函数。

trans-unit.source: This function is called automatically by pygame.init().
trans-unit.target: pygame.init() 自动调用此函数。

trans-unit.source: This function is like an optimized version of pygame.display.flip() for software displays. It allows only a portion of the screen to updated, instead of the entire area. If no argument is passed it updates the entire Surface area like pygame.display.flip().
trans-unit.target: 此功能类似于 pygame.display.flip() 的软件显示的优化版本。它仅允许屏幕的一部分进行更新，而不是整个区域。如果未传递任何参数，则它将更新整个Surface区域，如 pygame.display.flip() 。

trans-unit.source: This function is not necessary if your program is consistently processing events on the queue through the other pygame.event functions.
trans-unit.target: 如果您的程序通过其他 pygame.event 函数持续处理队列中的事件，则不需要此函数。

trans-unit.source: This function is provided for pygame testing and debugging.
trans-unit.target: 该函数用于pygame的测试和调试。

trans-unit.source: This function is provided for pygame testing and debugging. If smoothscale causes an invalid instruction error then it is a pygame/SDL bug that should be reported. Use this function as a temporary fix only.
trans-unit.target: 这个函数是为了pygame测试和调试而提供的。如果 smoothscale 导致无效指令错误,那么这是一个 pygame/SDL 错误,应该被报告。仅将此函数用作临时修复。

trans-unit.source: This function is used in encoding file paths. Keyword arguments are supported.
trans-unit.target: 该函数用于对文件路径进行编码。支持关键字参数。

trans-unit.source: This function is used to encode file paths in pygame. Encoding is to the codec as returned by sys.getfilesystemencoding(). Keyword arguments are supported.
trans-unit.target: 此函数用于在pygame中编码文件路径。编码是 sys.getfilesystemencoding() 返回的编解码器。支持关键字参数。

trans-unit.source: This function returns a list of possible sizes for a specified color depth. The return value will be an empty list if no display modes are available with the given arguments. A return value of -1 means that any requested size should work (this is likely the case for windowed modes). Mode sizes are sorted from biggest to smallest.
trans-unit.target: 此函数返回一个指定颜色深度的可能尺寸列表,如果给定参数中没有可用的显示模式,则返回值为空。如果给定的参数中没有可用的显示模式,则返回值将是一个空列表。返回值为-1表示任何要求的尺寸都可以使用(这可能是窗口模式的情况)。模式的大小是按照从大到小的顺序排列的。

trans-unit.source: This function should only be called in the thread that initialized pygame.display.
trans-unit.target: 仅应在初始化 pygame.display 的线程中调用此函数。

trans-unit.source: This function takes arguments similar to pygame.image.tostring(). The size argument is a pair of numbers representing the width and height. Once the new Surface is created you can destroy the string buffer.
trans-unit.target: 该函数采用类似于 pygame.image.tostring() 的参数。size参数是一对数字，代表宽度和高度。一旦创建了新的Surface，就可以销毁字符串缓冲区。

trans-unit.source: This function uses the same arguments as pygame.display.set_mode(). It is used to determine if a requested display mode is available. It will return 0 if the display mode cannot be set. Otherwise it will return a pixel depth that best matches the display asked for.
trans-unit.target: 该函数使用与 pygame.display.set_mode() 相同的参数。它用于确定请求的显示模式是否可用。如果无法设置显示模式，它将返回0。否则，它将返回最匹配显示要求的像素深度。

trans-unit.source: This function will create a display Surface. The arguments passed in are requests for a display type. The actual created display will be the best possible match supported by the system.
trans-unit.target: 这个函数将创建一个显示Surface。传入的参数是对显示类型的请求。实际创建的显示类型将是系统支持的最佳匹配。

trans-unit.source: This function will temporarily lock and unlock the Surface as needed.
trans-unit.target: 该功能将根据需要临时锁定和解锁Surface。

trans-unit.source: This function will temporarily lock the Surface as pixels are copied (see the pygame.Surface.lock() - lock the Surface memory for pixel access method).
trans-unit.target: 复制像素时，此函数将临时锁定Surface（请参见 pygame.Surface.lock() -锁定Surface内存以进行像素访问方法）。

trans-unit.source: This function will temporarily lock the Surface as pixels are copied.
trans-unit.target: 该功能将在复制像素时暂时锁定Surface。

trans-unit.source: This function will temporarily lock the Surface as the new values are copied.
trans-unit.target: 该功能将在复制新值时暂时锁定Surface。

trans-unit.source: This gets the number of milliseconds that the music has been playing for. The returned time only represents how long the music has been playing; it does not take into account any starting position offsets.
trans-unit.target: 获取音乐播放的毫秒数。返回的时间只代表音乐播放的时间,不考虑任何起始位置的偏移。

trans-unit.source: This group is fully compatible with pygame.sprite.Sprite.
trans-unit.target: 该组与 pygame.sprite.Sprite 完全兼容。

trans-unit.source: This group requires pygame.sprite.DirtySprite or any sprite that has the following attributes:
trans-unit.target: 该组需要 pygame.sprite.DirtySprite 或具有以下属性的任何sprite：

trans-unit.source: This is a combined scale and rotation transform. The resulting Surface will be a filtered 32-bit Surface. The scale argument is a floating point value that will be multiplied by the current resolution. The angle argument is a floating point value that represents the counterclockwise degrees to rotate. A negative rotation angle will rotate clockwise.
trans-unit.target: 这是一个结合了缩放和旋转的变换。得到的Surface是一个过滤后的32位Surface。刻度参数是一个浮点数,将乘以当前的分辨率。角度参数是一个浮点值,代表要旋转的逆时针度数。负的旋转角度将顺时针旋转。

trans-unit.source: This is a more featureful method of getting a Mask from a surface.
trans-unit.target: 这是从表面获取 Mask 的更有特色的方法。

trans-unit.source: This is a stress test for the fastevents module.
trans-unit.target: 这是对fastevents模块的压力测试。

trans-unit.source: This is an in place operation that directly affects the pixels of the PixelArray.
trans-unit.target: 这是一个就地操作,直接影响PixelArray的像素。

trans-unit.source: This is not needed for normal pygame usage.
trans-unit.target: 这对于正常的pygame使用是不需要的。

trans-unit.source: This is not quality 'ui' code at all, but you can see how to implement very non-interactive status displays, or even a crude text output control.
trans-unit.target: 这根本不是高质量的 "用户界面 "代码,但你可以看到如何实现非常非交互式的状态显示,甚至是一个粗糙的文本输出控件。

trans-unit.source: This is particularly difficult under Windows.
trans-unit.target: 这在Windows下尤为困难。

trans-unit.source: This is the full and final example from the Pygame Tutorial, "How Do I Make It Move". It creates 10 objects and animates them on the screen.
trans-unit.target: 这是Pygame教程 "如何让它移动 "中的最后一个完整的例子。它创建了10个对象,并在屏幕上制作了动画。

trans-unit.source: This is the same as Surface.get_bytesize() for the pixel array's surface.
trans-unit.target: 这与像素阵列表面的 Surface.get_bytesize() 相同。

trans-unit.source: This is the version represented as a string. It can contain a micro release number as well, e.g. '1.5.2'
trans-unit.target: 这是表示为字符串的版本。它也可以包含一个微型发行号，例如 '1.5.2'

trans-unit.source: This is true when the display window has keyboard focus from the system. If the display needs to ensure it does not lose keyboard focus, it can use pygame.event.set_grab() to grab all input.
trans-unit.target: 当显示窗口具有系统的键盘焦点时，这是正确的。如果显示需要确保它不会失去键盘焦点，则可以使用 pygame.event.set_grab() 获取所有输入。

trans-unit.source: This is usually used for placing pygame.USEREVENT events on the queue. Although any type of event can be placed, if using the system event types your program should be sure to create the standard attributes with appropriate values.
trans-unit.target: 通常用于将 pygame.USEREVENT 事件放在队列中。尽管可以放置任何类型的事件，但是如果使用系统事件类型，则程序应确保创建具有适当值的标准属性。

trans-unit.source: This loads cursors for a simple subset of XBM files. XBM files are traditionally used to store cursors on UNIX systems, they are an ASCII format used to represent simple images.
trans-unit.target: 这将为 XBM 文件的简单子集加载游标。 XBM 文件传统上用于在UNIX系统上存储游标，它们是用于表示简单图像的ASCII格式。

trans-unit.source: This method implicitly locks the Surface. The lock will be released when the returned pygame.BufferProxy object is garbage collected.
trans-unit.target: 此方法隐式锁定Surface。当返回的 pygame.BufferProxy 对象被垃圾回收时，该锁将被释放。

trans-unit.source: This method is called automatically by pygame.init(). It initializes the font module. The module must be initialized before any other functions will work.
trans-unit.target: pygame.init() 自动调用此方法。它初始化字体模块。必须先初始化模块，然后其他功能才能起作用。

trans-unit.source: This method is for explicitly closing the PixelArray, and releasing a lock on the Suface.
trans-unit.target: 该方法用于显式关闭PixelArray,并释放对Suface的锁定。

trans-unit.source: This method is intended for pygame unit testing. It unlikely has any use in an application.
trans-unit.target: 这个方法是用于pygame单元测试的。它在应用程序中不太可能有任何用途。

trans-unit.source: This method is most useful when working in a window. By contrast, in full-screen mode, this method always returns true.
trans-unit.target: 当在窗口中工作时,这个方法是最有用的。相比之下,在全屏模式下,这个方法总是返回true。

trans-unit.source: This method returns a new view of the pixel array with the rows and columns swapped. So for a (w, h) sized array a (h, w) slice is returned. If an array is one dimensional, then a length 1 x dimension is added, resulting in a 2D pixel array.
trans-unit.target: 本方法返回一个新的像素数组视图,并将其行和列交换。因此,对于一个(w,h)大小的数组,将返回一个(h,w)切片。如果一个数组是一维的,那么将增加一个长度为1x维的数组,结果是一个2D的像素数组。

trans-unit.source: This method should be called once per frame. It will compute how many milliseconds have passed since the previous call.
trans-unit.target: 这个方法每帧应该被调用一次,它将计算距离上次调用已经过去多少毫秒。它将计算自上次调用以来已经过去了多少毫秒。

trans-unit.source: This module also contains a few cursors as formatted strings. You'll need to pass these to pygame.cursors.compile() function before you can use them. The example call would look like this:
trans-unit.target: 该模块还包含一些作为格式化字符串的游标。您需要 pygame.cursors.compile() 它们传递给pygame.cursors.compile（）函数，然后才能使用它们。示例调用如下所示：

trans-unit.source: This module contains classes for loading Sound objects and controlling playback. The mixer module is optional and depends on SDL_mixer. Your program should test that pygame.mixer is available and initialized before using it.
trans-unit.target: 该模块包含用于加载声音对象和控制播放的类。混合器模块是可选的，取决于SDL_mixer。您的程序应在使用 pygame.mixer 之前对其进行测试并进行初始化。

trans-unit.source: This module contains functions for dealing with the keyboard.
trans-unit.target: 该模块包含处理键盘的功能。

trans-unit.source: This module contains several simple classes to be used within games. There is the main Sprite class and several Group classes that contain Sprites. The use of these classes is entirely optional when using pygame. The classes are fairly lightweight and only provide a starting place for the code that is common to most games.
trans-unit.target: 这个模块包含几个简单的类,可以在游戏中使用。有一个主Sprite类和几个包含Sprite的Group类。在使用 pygame 时,这些类的使用是完全可选的。这些类是相当轻量级的,只是为大多数游戏中常见的代码提供了一个起点。

trans-unit.source: This module contains various constants used by pygame. Its contents are automatically placed in the pygame module namespace. However, an application can use pygame.locals to include only the pygame constants with a from pygame.locals import *.
trans-unit.target: 该模块包含pygame使用的各种常量。它的内容自动放置在pygame模块的命名空间中。但是，应用程序可以使用 pygame.locals 仅包含 from pygame.locals import * 的pygame常量。

trans-unit.source: This module is automatically imported into the pygame package and can be used to check which version of pygame has been imported.
trans-unit.target: 这个模块会自动导入到pygame包中,可以用来检查导入了哪个版本的pygame。

trans-unit.source: This module offers control over the pygame display. Pygame has a single display Surface that is either contained in a window or runs full screen. Once you create the display you treat it as a regular Surface. Changes are not immediately visible onscreen; you must choose one of the two flipping functions to update the actual display.
trans-unit.target: 该模块提供对pygame显示的控制。Pygame有一个单一的显示Surface,它要么包含在一个窗口中,要么全屏运行。一旦你创建了显示,你就会把它当作一个普通的Surface。变化在屏幕上并不立即可见;你必须选择两个翻转功能中的一个来更新实际的显示。

trans-unit.source: This more closely resembles a port of the SDL Aliens demo. The code is a lot simpler, so it makes a better starting point for people looking at code for the first times. These blitting routines are not as optimized as they should/could be, but the code is easier to follow, and it plays quick enough.
trans-unit.target: 这更类似于 SDL Aliens演示的端口。代码简单得多，因此对于初次看代码的人来说，它是一个更好的起点。这些blitting例程未达到应有/应有的优化，但是代码更易于遵循，并且播放速度足够快。

trans-unit.source: This really only has an effect on simple images with solid colors. On photographic and antialiased images it will look like a regular unfiltered scale.
trans-unit.target: 这实际上只对纯色的简单图像有影响。在摄影和反锯齿图像上,它将看起来像一个普通的未经过滤的规模。

trans-unit.source: This returns the Channel object for the channel that was selected.
trans-unit.target: 返回被选择的通道的通道对象。

trans-unit.source: This returns the actual number of milliseconds used.
trans-unit.target: 返回实际使用的毫秒数。

trans-unit.source: This sets the position in the music file where playback will start. The meaning of "pos", a float (or a number that can be converted to a float), depends on the music format. For MOD files, it is the integer pattern number in the module. For OGG it the absolute position, in seconds, from the beginning of the sound. For MP3 files, it is the relative position, in seconds, from the current position. For absolute positioning in an MP3 file, first call rewind(). Other file formats are unsupported. Newer versions of SDL_mixer have better positioning support than earlier. An SDLError is raised if a particular format does not support positioning.
trans-unit.target: 这将在音乐文件中设置开始播放的位置。浮点数（或可以转换为浮点数的数字）“ pos”的含义取决于音乐格式。对于 MOD 文件，它是模块中的整数模式编号。对于 OGG ,它是从声音开始起的绝对位置（以秒为单位）。对于 MP3 文件，它是距当前位置的相对位置（以秒为单位）。要在 MP3 文件中进行绝对定位，请首先调用 rewind() 。不支持其他文件格式。较新版本的SDL_mixer比以前具有更好的定位支持。如果特定格式不支持定位，则会引发SDLError。

trans-unit.source: This sets the rectangle used for typing with an IME. It controls where the candidate list will open, if supported.
trans-unit.target: 此项设置用于输入IME的矩形。它控制候选列表的打开位置(如果支持)。

trans-unit.source: This simple example is derived from the line-by-line tutorial that comes with pygame. It is based on a 'popular' web banner. Note there are comments here, but for the full explanation, follow along in the tutorial.
trans-unit.target: 这个简单的例子来自于pygame的逐行教程。它是基于一个 "流行 "的网络横幅。请注意,这里有注释,但要了解完整的解释,请跟着教程走。

trans-unit.source: This started off as a port of the SDL demonstration, Aliens. Now it has evolved into something sort of resembling fun. This demonstrates a lot of different uses of sprites and optimized blitting. Also transparency, colorkeys, fonts, sound, music, joystick, and more. (PS, my high score is 117! goodluck)
trans-unit.target: 它最初是作为 SDL 演示程序Aliens的一个端口。现在，它已经演变成某种类似的乐趣。这说明了精灵的许多不同用法和优化的发条。还有透明度，色键，字体，声音，音乐，操纵杆等。（PS，我的最高分是117！祝你好运）

trans-unit.source: This uses pyportmidi for now, but may use its own bindings at some point in the future. The pyportmidi bindings are included with pygame.
trans-unit.target: 目前使用pyportmidi,但将来可能会使用自己的绑定。pyportmidi 绑定包含在 pygame 中。

trans-unit.source: This value is different than the per pixel Surface alpha. For a surface with per pixel alpha, blanket alpha is ignored and None is returned.
trans-unit.target: 此值不同于每个像素的表面alpha。对于具有每个像素Alpha的曲面，将忽略毯式Alpha，并且 None 返回None。

trans-unit.source: This value is digital, i.e., each coordinate can be -1, 0 or 1 but never in-between.
trans-unit.target: 该值是数字值， i.e. 每个坐标可以是-1、0或1，但不能介于两者之间。

trans-unit.source: This value is not needed for normal pygame usage.
trans-unit.target: 正常使用pygame时不需要这个值。

trans-unit.source: This versatile function can be used for find colors in a 'surf' close to a 'search_color' or close to colors in a separate 'search_surf'.
trans-unit.target: 这个多功能的功能可以用于在接近 "search_color "的 "surf "中查找颜色,或者接近单独的 "search_surf "中的颜色。

trans-unit.source: This version information can easily be compared with other version numbers of the same format. An example of checking pygame version numbers would look like this:
trans-unit.target: 这些版本信息可以很容易地与其他相同格式的版本号进行比较。一个检查pygame版本号的例子是这样的。

trans-unit.source: This will begin playback of a Sound on a specific Channel. If the Channel is currently playing any other Sound it will be stopped.
trans-unit.target: 这将开始播放一个特定通道上的声音。如果该频道目前正在播放任何其他声音,它将被停止。

trans-unit.source: This will change the video display color palette for 8-bit displays. This does not change the palette for the actual display Surface, only the palette that is used to display the Surface. If no palette argument is passed, the system default palette will be restored. The palette is a sequence of RGB triplets.
trans-unit.target: 这将更改8位显示器的视频显示器调色板。这不会更改实际显示Surface的调色板，只会更改用于显示Surface的调色板。如果未传递任何调色板参数，则将还原系统默认调色板。调色板是 RGB 三胞胎的序列。

trans-unit.source: This will fade out the volume on all active channels over the time argument in milliseconds. After the sound is muted the playback will stop.
trans-unit.target: 这将在以毫秒为单位的时间参数中淡化所有活动通道的音量。声音被静音后,播放将停止。

trans-unit.source: This will find and return an inactive Channel object. If there are no inactive Channels this function will return None. If there are no inactive channels and the force argument is True, this will find the Channel with the longest running Sound and return it.
trans-unit.target: 这将找到并返回一个无效的Channel对象。如果没有不活动的通道，则此函数将返回 None 。如果没有无效通道，并且force参数为 True ，这将找到运行时间最长的Sound并返回它。

trans-unit.source: This will find collisions between all the Sprites in two groups. Collision is determined by comparing the Sprite.rect attribute of each Sprite or by using the collided function if it is not None.
trans-unit.target: 这将发现两组中所有Sprite之间的碰撞。通过比较每个Sprite 的 Sprite.rect 属性或如果不为None则使用碰撞函数来确定碰撞。

trans-unit.source: This will flip the width or height of a rectangle if it has a negative size. The rectangle will remain in the same place, with only the sides swapped.
trans-unit.target: 如果一个矩形的大小为负数,这将翻转它的宽度或高度。矩形将保持在同一位置,只是两边互换。

trans-unit.source: This will get all the messages and remove them from the queue. If a type or sequence of types is given only those messages will be removed from the queue.
trans-unit.target: 这将获得所有的消息并从队列中移除它们。如果给定了一个类型或类型序列,只有这些消息会从队列中移除。

trans-unit.source: This will load a music filename/file object and prepare it for playback. If a music stream is already playing it will be stopped. This does not start the music playing.
trans-unit.target: 这将加载一个音乐文件名/文件对象,并为播放做准备。如果一个音乐流已经在播放,它将被停止。这不会开始播放音乐。

trans-unit.source: This will load a sound file and queue it. A queued sound file will begin as soon as the current sound naturally ends. Only one sound can be queued at a time. Queuing a new sound while another sound is queued will result in the new sound becoming the queued sound. Also, if the current sound is ever stopped or changed, the queued sound will be lost.
trans-unit.target: 这将加载一个声音文件并将其排队。当当前声音自然结束时,排队的声音文件就会开始。一次只能有一个声音被排队。当另一个声音在排队时,排队新的声音将导致新的声音成为排队的声音。此外,如果当前声音被停止或改变,排队的声音将丢失。

trans-unit.source: This will only work on Surfaces that have 24-bit or 32-bit formats. Lower pixel formats cannot be referenced.
trans-unit.target: 这只适用于24位或32位格式的Surface。较低的像素格式不能被引用。

trans-unit.source: This will open the cdrom drive and eject the cdrom. If the drive is playing or paused it will be stopped.
trans-unit.target: 这将打开光盘驱动器并弹出光盘。如果驱动器正在播放或暂停,它将被停止。

trans-unit.source: This will play the loaded music stream. If the music is already playing it will be restarted.
trans-unit.target: 这将播放加载的音乐流。如果音乐已经在播放,它将被重新启动。

trans-unit.source: This will resume all active sound channels after they have been paused.
trans-unit.target: 这将在暂停后恢复所有活动的声音通道。

trans-unit.source: This will resume the playback of a music stream after it has been paused.
trans-unit.target: 这将在音乐流暂停后恢复播放。

trans-unit.source: This will return a new image that is double the size of the original. It uses the AdvanceMAME Scale2X algorithm which does a 'jaggie-less' scale of bitmap graphics.
trans-unit.target: 这将返回一个新的图像,其大小是原来的两倍。它使用AdvanceMAME Scale2X算法,对位图图形进行 "无锯齿 "缩放。

trans-unit.source: This will return the affected Surface area.
trans-unit.target: 这将返回受影响的表面区域。

trans-unit.source: This will run much faster than pygame.image.fromstring(), since no pixel data must be allocated and copied.
trans-unit.target: 这将比 pygame.image.fromstring() 快得多，因为不必分配和复制任何像素数据。

trans-unit.source: This will save your Surface as either a BMP, TGA, PNG, or JPEG image. If the filename extension is unrecognized it will default to TGA. Both TGA, and BMP file formats create uncompressed files.
trans-unit.target: 这会将您的Surface保存为 BMP ， TGA ， PNG 或 JPEG 图像。如果无法识别文件扩展名，则默认为 TGA 。无论 TGA 和 BMP 格式的文件创建未压缩的文件。

trans-unit.source: This will set the playback volume (loudness) for this Sound. This will immediately affect the Sound if it is playing. It will also affect any future playback of this Sound.
trans-unit.target: 这将设置该声音的播放音量(响度)。如果声音正在播放,这将立即影响它。它也会影响此声音今后的任何播放。

trans-unit.source: This will shut down the entire display module. This means any active displays will be closed. This will also be handled automatically when the program exits.
trans-unit.target: 这将关闭整个显示模块。这意味着任何活动的显示器都将被关闭。当程序退出时,这也会自动处理。

trans-unit.source: This will stop all playback of all active mixer channels.
trans-unit.target: 这将停止所有活动混音器通道的所有播放。

trans-unit.source: This will stop playback of the sound after fading it out over the time argument in milliseconds. The Sound will fade and stop on all actively playing channels.
trans-unit.target: 这将停止播放的声音后淡出的时间参数毫秒。声音将在所有正在播放的通道上淡出并停止。

trans-unit.source: This will stop the music playback after it has been faded out over the specified time (measured in milliseconds).
trans-unit.target: 当音乐在指定时间(以毫秒为单位)内淡出后,将停止音乐播放。

trans-unit.source: This will stop the playback of this Sound on any active Channels.
trans-unit.target: 这将停止在任何活动的频道上播放这个声音。

trans-unit.source: This will temporarily stop all playback on the active mixer channels. The playback can later be resumed with pygame.mixer.unpause()
trans-unit.target: 这将暂时停止活动混音器通道上的所有播放。稍后可以使用 pygame.mixer.unpause() 恢复播放

trans-unit.source: This will uninitialize pygame.mixer. All playback will stop and any loaded Sound objects may not be compatible with the mixer if it is reinitialized later.
trans-unit.target: 这将 pygame.mixer 初始化pygame.mixer。如果稍后重新初始化，所有播放将停止，并且任何加载的声音对象都可能与混音器不兼容。

trans-unit.source: This will uninitialize a Joystick. After this the pygame event queue will no longer receive events from the device.
trans-unit.target: 这将取消初始化操纵杆。之后,pygame事件队列将不再接收来自设备的事件。

trans-unit.source: This will update the contents of the entire display. If your display mode is using the flags pygame.HWSURFACE and pygame.DOUBLEBUF, this will wait for a vertical retrace and swap the surfaces. If you are using a different type of display mode, it will simply update the entire contents of the surface.
trans-unit.target: 这将更新整个显示的内容。如果您的显示模式使用 pygame.HWSURFACE 和 pygame.DOUBLEBUF 标志，这将等待垂直回扫并交换曲面。如果使用其他类型的显示模式，它将仅更新曲面的全部内容。

trans-unit.source: This will work on any type of Surface format. If the image has no colorkey a solid opaque array will be returned.
trans-unit.target: 这将在任何类型的Surface格式上工作,如果图像没有colorkey,将返回一个不透明的数组。如果图像没有colorkey,将返回一个不透明的固体数组。

trans-unit.source: Threading note: each of the functions releases the GIL during the C part of the call.
trans-unit.target: 线程说明:每个函数在调用的C部分释放GIL。

trans-unit.source: Thumbnail generation with scaling is an example of what you can do with pygame.
trans-unit.target: 缩略图生成与缩放是你可以用pygame做的一个例子。

trans-unit.source: Time is measured relative to the time source indicated by time_proc. Timestamps are absolute, not relative delays or offsets.
trans-unit.target: 时间是相对于time_proc所指示的时间源而测量的。时间戳是绝对的,不是相对的延迟或偏移。

trans-unit.source: Times in pygame are represented in milliseconds (1/1000 seconds). Most platforms have a limited time resolution of around 10 milliseconds. This resolution, in milliseconds, is given in the TIMER_RESOLUTION constant.
trans-unit.target: pygame中的时间以毫秒（1/1000秒）表示。大多数平台的时间分辨率有限，大约为10毫秒。该分辨率（以毫秒为单位）在 TIMER_RESOLUTION 常量中给出。

trans-unit.source: Timestamps will be ignored if latency = 0
trans-unit.target: 如果延迟=0,时间戳将被忽略。

trans-unit.source: To access most of the Joystick methods, you'll need to init() the Joystick. This is separate from making sure the joystick module is initialized. When multiple Joysticks objects are created for the same physical joystick device (i.e., they have the same ID number), the state and values for those Joystick objects will be shared.
trans-unit.target: 要访问大多数操纵杆方法，您需要 init() 操纵杆。这与确保操纵杆模块已初始化是分开的。当为同一物理操纵杆设备创建多个操纵杆对象（即它们具有相同的 ID 号）时，这些操纵杆对象的状态和值将被共享。

trans-unit.source: To disable the timer for an event, set the milliseconds argument to 0.
trans-unit.target: 要禁用事件的定时器,将毫秒参数设置为0。

trans-unit.source: To draw an anti aliased and filled shape, first use the aa* version of the function, and then use the filled version. For example
trans-unit.target: 要绘制反别名和填充形状,首先要使用aa*版本的函数,然后使用填充版本。例如

trans-unit.source: To get a note to play immediately, send MIDI info with timestamp read from function Time
trans-unit.target: 要想让一个音符立即播放,可以发送带有时间戳的MIDI信息,这些信息是从时间功能中读取的。

trans-unit.source: To get the state of various input devices, you can forego the event queue and access the input devices directly with their appropriate modules: pygame.mouse, pygame.key, and pygame.joystick. If you use this method, remember that pygame requires some form of communication with the system window manager and other parts of the platform. To keep pygame in sync with the system, you will need to call pygame.event.pump() to keep everything current. Usually, this should be called once per game loop. Note: Joysticks will not send any events until the device has been initialized.
trans-unit.target: 要获取各种输入设备的状态，您可以放弃事件队列，并直接使用相应的模块 pygame.mouse ， pygame.key 和 pygame.joystick 访问输入设备。如果使用此方法，请记住pygame需要与系统窗口管理器和平台的其他部分进行某种形式的通信。为了使pygame与系统保持同步，您需要调用 pygame.event.pump() 来使所有内容保持最新。通常，每个游戏循环应调用一次。注意：在初始化设备之前，操纵杆不会发送任何事件。

trans-unit.source: To skip drawing the set bits, both setsurface and setcolor must be None. The setsurface parameter defaults to None, but setcolor defaults to a color value and therefore must be set to None.
trans-unit.target: 要跳过绘制设置位， setsurface 和 setcolor 都必须为 None 。所述 setsurface 参数默认为 None ，但 setcolor 默认为一个颜色值，并且因此必须被设置为 None 。

trans-unit.source: To skip drawing the unset bits, both unsetsurface and unsetcolor must be None. The unsetsurface parameter defaults to None, but unsetcolor defaults to a color value and therefore must be set to None.
trans-unit.target: 要跳过绘制未设置的位， unsetsurface 和 unsetcolor 都必须为 None 。所述 unsetsurface 参数默认为 None ，但 unsetcolor 默认为一个颜色值，并且因此必须被设置为 None 。

trans-unit.source: To specify both the interface and the device name in the registry, separate the two with a comma and a space. The string before the comma must be a substring of the "interf" string and the string after the space must be a substring of the "name" name string in order to match the device. e.g.:
trans-unit.target: 要在注册表中同时指定接口和设备名称,请用逗号和空格将两者分开。逗号前的字符串必须是 "interf "字符串的子串,空格后的字符串必须是 "name "名称字符串的子串,这样才能与设备相匹配。

trans-unit.source: To use the pygame.freetype based pygame.ftfont as pygame.font define the environment variable PYGAME_FREETYPE before the first import of pygame. Module pygame.ftfont is a pygame.font compatible module that passes all but one of the font module unit tests: it does not have the UCS-2 limitation of the SDL_ttf based font module, so fails to raise an exception for a code point greater than 'uFFFF'. If pygame.freetype is unavailable then the SDL_ttf font module will be loaded instead.
trans-unit.target: 要使用 pygame.freetype 基于 pygame.ftfont 作为 pygame.font 首次进口之前定义环境变量PYGAME_FREETYPE pygame 的。模块 pygame.ftfont 是一个 pygame.font 兼容模块，通过了除一个字体模块单元测试以外的所有测试：它没有基于SDL_ttf的字体模块的UCS-2限制，因此无法为更大的代码点引发异常而不是“ uFFFF”。如果 pygame.freetype 不可用，则将加载SDL_ttf字体模块。

trans-unit.source: True, Pixels within threshold are changed.
trans-unit.target: True,在阈值内的像素被改变。

trans-unit.source: Turn a note off in the output stream. The note must already be on for this to work correctly.
trans-unit.target: 关闭输出流中的音符。该音符必须已经打开才能正常工作。

trans-unit.source: Turn a note on in the output stream. The note must already be off for this to work correctly.
trans-unit.target: 打开输出流中的音符。该音符必须已经关闭才能正常工作。

trans-unit.source: Unfiltered counterclockwise rotation. The angle argument represents degrees and can be any floating point value. Negative angle amounts will rotate clockwise.
trans-unit.target: 未经过滤的逆时针旋转。角度参数代表度数,可以是任何浮点值。负的角度值将顺时针旋转。

trans-unit.source: Uninitialize a drive for use. Call this when your program will not be accessing the drive for awhile.
trans-unit.target: 解除对硬盘的初始化。当您的程序暂时不访问驱动器时,调用此功能。

trans-unit.source: Uninitialize all pygame modules that have previously been initialized. When the Python interpreter shuts down, this method is called regardless, so your program should not need it, except when it wants to terminate its pygame resources and continue. It is safe to call this function more than once as repeated calls have no effect.
trans-unit.target: 取消初始化所有之前已经初始化过的 pygame 模块。当Python解释器关闭时,无论如何都会调用这个方法,所以你的程序应该不需要它,除非它想终止pygame资源并继续。多次调用这个函数是安全的,因为重复调用没有任何效果。

trans-unit.source: Uninitialize the cdrom module. After you call this any existing CD objects will no longer work.
trans-unit.target: 取消初始化cdrom模块。调用此命令后，任何现有的 CD 对象将不再起作用。

trans-unit.source: Uninitialize the display module
trans-unit.target: 解除对显示模块的初始化

trans-unit.source: Uninitialize the joystick module.
trans-unit.target: 解除对操纵杆模块的初始化。

trans-unit.source: Uninitialize the joystick module. After you call this any existing joystick objects will no longer work.
trans-unit.target: 取消初始化操纵杆模块。调用此功能后,任何现有的操纵杆对象将不再工作。

trans-unit.source: Uninitializes the pygame.midi module. If pygame.midi.init() was called to initialize the pygame.midi module, then this function will be called automatically when your program exits.
trans-unit.target: 取消初始化 pygame.midi 模块。如果调用 pygame.midi.init() 来初始化 pygame.midi 模块，则在程序退出时将自动调用此函数。

trans-unit.source: Unless rotating by 90 degree increments, the image will be padded larger to hold the new size. If the image has pixel alphas, the padded area will be transparent. Otherwise pygame will pick a color that matches the Surface colorkey or the topleft pixel value.
trans-unit.target: 除非以90度为增量旋转,否则图像将被垫大以保持新的尺寸。如果图像有象素,填充区域将是透明的。否则,pygame将选择与Surface colorkey或topleft像素值相匹配的颜色。

trans-unit.source: Unlike the convert() method, the pixel format for the new image will not be exactly the same as the requested source, but it will be optimized for fast alpha blitting to the destination.
trans-unit.target: 与 convert() 方法不同，新图像的像素格式将与请求的源不完全相同，但会针对快速Alpha传递到目标进行优化。

trans-unit.source: Unload the currently loaded music to free up resources
trans-unit.target: 卸载当前加载的音乐以释放资源。

trans-unit.source: Unlock the Surface pixel data after it has been locked. The unlocked Surface can once again be drawn and managed by pygame. See the lock() documentation for more details.
trans-unit.target: 锁定后解锁表面像素数据。解锁的Surface可以再次由pygame绘制和管理。有关更多详细信息，请参见 lock() 文档。

trans-unit.source: Unpause a paused CD. If the CD is not paused or already playing, this method does nothing.
trans-unit.target: 取消暂停已暂停的 CD 。如果 CD 未暂停或尚未播放，则此方法不执行任何操作。

trans-unit.source: Update portions of the screen for software displays
trans-unit.target: 更新屏幕上的部分软件显示

trans-unit.source: Update the full display Surface to the screen
trans-unit.target: 将全屏显示的Surface更新为屏幕

trans-unit.source: Used internally (read-only)
trans-unit.target: 内部使用(只读)

trans-unit.source: Used to indicate if any data exists.
trans-unit.target: 用于指示是否存在任何数据。

trans-unit.source: Useful for fast pixel perfect collision detection. A mask uses 1 bit per-pixel to store which parts collide.
trans-unit.target: 用于快速的像素完美碰撞检测。掩码使用每像素1位来存储哪些部分会发生碰撞。

trans-unit.source: User defined types can be used, but the data might not be accessible by other applications unless they know what data type to look for. Example: Data placed into the clipboard by pygame.scrap.put("my_data_type", byte_data) can only be accessed by applications which query the clipboard for the "my_data_type" data type.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用用户定义的类型，但是其他应用程序可能无法访问该数据，除非他们知道要查找的数据类型。示例： pygame.scrap.put("my_data_type", byte_data) 放置到剪贴板中的数据只能由向剪贴板查询 "my_data_type" 数据类型的应用程序访问。

trans-unit.source: Uses one of two different algorithms for scaling each dimension of the input surface as required. For shrinkage, the output pixels are area averages of the colors they cover. For expansion, a bilinear filter is used. For the x86-64 and i686 architectures, optimized MMX routines are included and will run much faster than other machine types. The size is a 2 number sequence for (width, height). This function only works for 24-bit or 32-bit surfaces. An exception will be thrown if the input surface bit depth is less than 24.
trans-unit.target: 使用两种不同的算法之一来按需缩放输入表面的每个尺寸。为了缩小，输出像素是它们覆盖的颜色的面积平均值。为了扩展，使用双线性滤波器。对于x86-64和i686体系结构，包含了优化的 MMX 例程，它们的运行速度比其他计算机类型快得多。大小是2个数字的序列（宽度，高度）。此功能仅适用于24位或32位曲面。如果输入表面位深度小于24，则将引发异常。

trans-unit.source: Uses sndarray and NumPy to create offset faded copies of the original sound. Currently it just uses hardcoded values for the number of echoes and the delay. Easy for you to recreate as needed.
trans-unit.target: 使用 sndarray 和 NumPy 来创建原始声音的偏移淡化副本。目前它只是使用硬编码的回声数和延迟值。方便你根据需要重新创建。

trans-unit.source: Using PyOpenGL and pygame, this creates a spinning 3D multicolored cube.
trans-unit.target: 使用PyOpenGL和pygame,可以创建一个旋转的3D多色立方体。

trans-unit.source: Usually the depth argument is not passed, but some platforms can support multiple display depths. If passed it will hint to which depth is a better match.
trans-unit.target: 通常不传递深度参数,但有些平台可以支持多种显示深度。如果传递,它会提示到哪个深度更匹配。

trans-unit.source: We're always on the lookout for more examples and/or example requests. Code like this is probably the best way to start getting involved with python gaming.
trans-unit.target: 我们一直在寻找更多的例子和/或例子请求。这样的代码可能是开始参与python游戏的最好方式。

trans-unit.source: When render_to() is called with the same font properties ― size, style, strength, wide, antialiased, vertical, rotation, kerning, and use_bitmap_strikes ― as get_rect(), render_to() will use the layout calculated by get_rect(). Otherwise, render_to() will recalculate the layout if called with a text string or one of the above properties has changed after the get_rect() call.
trans-unit.target: 当 render_to() 被调用以相同的字体属性- size ， style ， strength ， wide ， antialiased ， vertical ， rotation ， kerning ，和 use_bitmap_strikes -如 get_rect() ， render_to() 将使用计算出的布局 get_rect() 。否则，如果在调用 get_rect() 之后使用文本字符串调用或上述属性之一已更改，则 render_to() 将重新计算布局。

trans-unit.source: When pygame.quit() is called, all registered quit functions are called. Pygame modules do this automatically when they are initializing, so this function will rarely be needed.
trans-unit.target: 当 pygame.quit() 被调用时，所有注册的退出函数被调用。Pygame模块在初始化时会自动执行此操作，因此几乎不需要此功能。

trans-unit.source: When a Sound is queued on a Channel, it will begin playing immediately after the current Sound is finished. Each channel can only have a single Sound queued at a time. The queued Sound will only play if the current playback finished automatically. It is cleared on any other call to Channel.stop() or Channel.play().
trans-unit.target: 当声音在通道上排队时，它将在当前声音完成后立即开始播放。每个通道一次只能排队一个声音。仅当当前播放自动完成时，排队的声音才会播放。在 Channel.stop() 或 Channel.play() 的任何其他调用上清除。

trans-unit.source: When an endevent is set for a channel, it will send an event to the pygame queue every time a sound finishes playing on that channel (not just the first time). Use pygame.event.get() to retrieve the endevent once it's sent.
trans-unit.target: 为通道设置结束事件后，每次声音在该通道上播放完毕（不仅是第一次）时，它将向pygame队列发送事件。发送结束事件后，请使用 pygame.event.get() 检索结束事件。

trans-unit.source: When assigning to a range of of pixels, a non tuple sequence of colors or a PixelArray can be used as the value. For a sequence, the length must match the PixelArray width.
trans-unit.target: 当分配到一个像素范围时,可以使用一个非元组的颜色序列或PixelArray作为值。对于一个序列,其长度必须与PixelArray的宽度相匹配。

trans-unit.source: When calling pygame.display.set_mode() with the pygame.OPENGL flag, Pygame automatically handles setting the OpenGL attributes like color and double-buffering. OpenGL offers several other attributes you may want control over. Pass one of these attributes as the flag, and its appropriate value. This must be called before pygame.display.set_mode().
trans-unit.target: 当使用 pygame.OPENGL 标志调用 pygame.display.set_mode() 时，Pygame自动处理OpenGL属性的设置，例如颜色和双缓冲。OpenGL提供了其他一些您可能需要控制的属性。将这些属性之一作为标志及其适当的值传递。必须在 pygame.display.set_mode() 之前调用它。

trans-unit.source: When compiled with SDL2, pygame has these additional events and their attributes.
trans-unit.target: 当用SDL2编译时,pygame有这些额外的事件及其属性。

trans-unit.source: When enabled, all rendered fonts will include an underline. The underline is always one pixel thick, regardless of font size. This can be mixed with the bold and italic modes.
trans-unit.target: 启用后,所有渲染的字体都会包含一个下划线。无论字体大小,下划线总是一个像素厚。这可以与粗体和斜体模式混合使用。

trans-unit.source: When pygame is initialized the key repeat is disabled.
trans-unit.target: 当pygame初始化时,按键重复被禁用。

trans-unit.source: When requesting fullscreen display modes, sometimes an exact match for the requested size cannot be made. In these situations pygame will select the closest compatible match. The returned surface will still always match the requested size.
trans-unit.target: 当请求全屏显示模式时,有时不能完全匹配所请求的尺寸。在这种情况下,pygame会选择最接近的匹配。返回的曲面仍将始终与请求的尺寸相匹配。

trans-unit.source: When running click on a black triangle to move one pixel in the direction the triangle points. Or use the arrow keys. Close the window or press ESC to quit.
trans-unit.target: 运行时，单击黑色三角形可在三角形指向的方向上移动一个像素。或使用箭头键。关闭窗口或按 ESC 退出。

trans-unit.source: When subclassing the Sprite, be sure to call the base initializer before adding the Sprite to Groups. For example:
trans-unit.target: 当对Sprite进行子类化时,一定要在将Sprite添加到Group之前调用基础初始化器。例如

trans-unit.source: When the display is iconified pygame.display.get_active() will return False. The event queue should receive a ACTIVEEVENT event when the window has been iconified.
trans-unit.target: 当显示图标化时， pygame.display.get_active() 将返回False。当窗口已被图标化时，事件队列应收到 ACTIVEEVENT 事件。

trans-unit.source: When the display mode is set, several events are placed on the pygame event queue. pygame.QUIT is sent when the user has requested the program to shut down. The window will receive pygame.ACTIVEEVENT events as the display gains and loses input focus. If the display is set with the pygame.RESIZABLE flag, pygame.VIDEORESIZE events will be sent when the user adjusts the window dimensions. Hardware displays that draw direct to the screen will get pygame.VIDEOEXPOSE events when portions of the window must be redrawn.
trans-unit.target: 设置显示模式后，将在pygame事件队列中放置几个​​事件。当用户请求关闭程序时，发送 pygame.QUIT 。该窗口将在显示获得和失去输入焦点时接收 pygame.ACTIVEEVENT 事件。如果显示设置为 pygame.RESIZABLE 标志， pygame.VIDEORESIZE 当用户调整窗口尺寸时，将发送pygame.VIDEORESIZE事件。当必须重新绘制部分窗口时，直接绘制到屏幕上的硬件显示将获得 pygame.VIDEOEXPOSE 事件。

trans-unit.source: When the display mode is set, the event queue will start receiving mouse events. The mouse buttons generate pygame.MOUSEBUTTONDOWN and pygame.MOUSEBUTTONUP events when they are pressed and released. These events contain a button attribute representing which button was pressed. The mouse wheel will generate pygame.MOUSEBUTTONDOWN and pygame.MOUSEBUTTONUP events when rolled. The button will be set to 4 when the wheel is rolled up, and to button 5 when the wheel is rolled down. Whenever the mouse is moved it generates a pygame.MOUSEMOTION event. The mouse movement is broken into small and accurate motion events. As the mouse is moving many motion events will be placed on the queue. Mouse motion events that are not properly cleaned from the event queue are the primary reason the event queue fills up.
trans-unit.target: 设置显示模式后，事件队列将开始接收鼠标事件。鼠标按钮在按下和释放时会生成 pygame.MOUSEBUTTONDOWN 和 pygame.MOUSEBUTTONUP 事件。这些事件包含一个按钮属性，代表按下哪个按钮。 pygame.MOUSEBUTTONUP 时，鼠标滚轮将生成 pygame.MOUSEBUTTONDOWN 和pygame.MOUSEBUTTONUP事件。滚轮向上滚动时，按钮设置为4；滚轮向下滚动时，按钮设置为5。每当鼠标移动时，都会生成一个 pygame.MOUSEMOTION 事件。鼠标移动分为小而准确的动作事件。当鼠标移动时，许多运动事件将被放置在队列中。无法从事件队列中正确清除鼠标运动事件是事件队列填满的主要原因。

trans-unit.source: When the keyboard repeat is enabled, keys that are held down will generate multiple pygame.KEYDOWN events. The delay is the number of milliseconds before the first repeated pygame.KEYDOWN will be sent. After that another pygame.KEYDOWN will be sent every interval milliseconds.
trans-unit.target: 启用键盘重复功能后，按下这些键将生成多个 pygame.KEYDOWN 事件。延迟是第一个重复的 pygame.KEYDOWN 发送之前的毫秒数。之后，每隔毫秒发送另一个 pygame.KEYDOWN 。

trans-unit.source: When the keyboard repeat is enabled, keys that are held down will generate multiple pygame.KEYDOWN events. The delay is the number of milliseconds before the first repeated pygame.KEYDOWN will be sent. After that another pygame.KEYDOWN will be sent every interval milliseconds. If no arguments are passed the key repeat is disabled.
trans-unit.target: 启用键盘重复功能后，按下这些键将生成多个 pygame.KEYDOWN 事件。延迟是第一个重复的 pygame.KEYDOWN 发送之前的毫秒数。之后，每隔毫秒发送另一个 pygame.KEYDOWN 。如果没有传递参数，则禁用重复键。

trans-unit.source: When the mouse cursor is visible, it will be displayed as a black and white bitmap using the given bitmask arrays. The size is a sequence containing the cursor width and height. Hotspot is a sequence containing the cursor hotspot position. xormasks is a sequence of bytes containing the cursor xor data masks. Lastly is andmasks, a sequence of bytes containing the cursor bitmask data.
trans-unit.target: 当鼠标光标可见时,将使用给定的位掩码数组将其显示为黑白位图。size是一个包含光标宽度和高度的序列,Hotspot是一个包含光标热点位置的序列。Hotspot是一个包含光标热点位置的序列。 xormasks是一个包含光标xor数据掩码的字节序列。最后是andmasks,是一个包含游标位掩码数据的字节序列。

trans-unit.source: When using width values > 1 refer to the width notes of line() for details on how thick lines grow.
trans-unit.target: 使用 width 值 > 1 请参考 line() 的 width 注释以获取有关粗线如何增长的详细信息。

trans-unit.source: When using width values > 1, lines will grow as follows.
trans-unit.target: 当 width 值 > 1 ，线将如下增长。

trans-unit.source: When using width values > 1, the edge lines will grow outside the original boundary of the polygon. For more details on how the thickness for edge lines grow, refer to the width notes of the pygame.draw.line() function.
trans-unit.target: 使用 width 值 > 1 ，边线将在多边形的原始边界外增长。有关边缘线的粗细如何增长的更多详细信息，请参阅 pygame.draw.line() 函数的 width 注释。

trans-unit.source: When using width values > 1, the edge lines will grow outside the original boundary of the rect. For more details on how the thickness for edge lines grow, refer to the width notes of the pygame.draw.line() function.
trans-unit.target: 当 width 值 > 1 ，边缘线将在矩形的原始边界外增长。有关边缘线的粗细如何增长的更多详细信息，请参阅 pygame.draw.line() 函数的 width 注释。

trans-unit.source: When using width values > 1, the edge lines will only grow inward from the original boundary of the rect parameter.
trans-unit.target: 使用 width 值 > 1 ，边线将仅从 rect 参数的原始边界向内增长。

trans-unit.source: When using width values > 1, the edge lines will only grow inward.
trans-unit.target: 使用 width 值 > 1 ，边线只会向内增长。

trans-unit.source: When using allowedchanges=0 it will convert the samples at runtime to match what the hardware supports. For example a sound card may not support 16bit sound samples, so instead it will use 8bit samples internally. If AUDIO_ALLOW_FORMAT_CHANGE is supplied, then the requested format will change to the closest that SDL2 supports.
trans-unit.target: 当使用 allowedchanges=0 时,它将在运行时转换样本以匹配硬件的支持。例如一个声卡可能不支持16bit的声音样本,所以它将在内部使用8bit的样本。如果提供了 AUDIO_ALLOW_FORMAT_CHANGE,那么所要求的格式将改变为最接近 SDL2 支持的格式。

trans-unit.source: When using an pygame.OPENGL display mode this will perform a gl buffer swap.
trans-unit.target: 当使用 pygame.OPENGL 显示模式时，将执行gl缓冲区交换。

trans-unit.source: When you import pygame all available pygame submodules are automatically imported. Be aware that some of the pygame modules are considered optional, and may not be available. In that case, pygame will provide a placeholder object instead of the module, which can be used to test for availability.
trans-unit.target: import pygame 时，将自动导入所有可用的pygame子模块。请注意，某些pygame模块被认为是可选模块，可能不可用。在这种情况下，pygame将提供一个占位符对象而不是模块，该模块可用于测试可用性。

trans-unit.source: When you create Joystick objects using Joystick(id), you pass an integer that must be lower than this count.
trans-unit.target: 使用 Joystick(id) 创建Joystick对象时，您传递的整数必须小于此计数。

trans-unit.source: When your program runs in a windowed environment, it will share the mouse and keyboard devices with other applications that have focus. If your program sets the event grab to True, it will lock all input into your program.
trans-unit.target: 当程序在窗口环境中运行时，它将与具有焦点的其他应用程序共享鼠标和键盘设备。如果您的程序将事件获取设置为 True ，它将锁定所有输入到您的程序中。

trans-unit.source: Whether to enable multisampling anti-aliasing. Defaults to 0 (disabled).
trans-unit.target: 是否启用多采样抗锯齿。默认值为0(禁用)。

trans-unit.source: While debugging and experimenting, you can print an event object for a quick display of its type and members. The function pygame.event.event_name() can be used to get a string representing the name of the event type.
trans-unit.target: 在调试和试验时，您可以打印事件对象以快速显示其类型和成员。函数 pygame.event.event_name() 可用于获取表示事件类型名称的字符串。

trans-unit.source: While it is possible to design sprite and group classes that don't derive from the Sprite and AbstractGroup classes below, it is strongly recommended that you extend those when you add a Sprite or Group class.
trans-unit.target: 虽然可以设计不从下面的Sprite和AbstractGroup类派生的sprite和Group类,但强烈建议你在添加一个Sprite或Group类时扩展这些类。

trans-unit.source: Width must be a multiple of 8, and the mask arrays must be the correct size for the given width and height. Otherwise an exception is raised.
trans-unit.target: 宽度必须是8的倍数,并且掩码数组必须是给定宽度和高度的正确尺寸。否则会引发一个异常。

trans-unit.source: Will pause for a given number of milliseconds. This function sleeps the process to share the processor with other programs. A program that waits for even a few milliseconds will consume very little processor time. It is slightly less accurate than the pygame.time.delay() function.
trans-unit.target: 将暂停指定的毫秒数。此功能使进程休眠以与其他程序共享处理器。一个即使等待几毫秒的程序也将消耗很少的处理器时间。它比 pygame.time.delay() 函数的精度稍差。

trans-unit.source: Will pause for a given number of milliseconds. This function will use the processor (rather than sleeping) in order to make the delay more accurate than pygame.time.wait().
trans-unit.target: 将暂停指定的毫秒数。此函数将使用处理器（而不是休眠），以使延迟比 pygame.time.wait() 更准确。

trans-unit.source: With the use of a virtual midi patch cord the output and input examples can be run as separate processes and connected so the keyboard output is displayed on a console.
trans-unit.target: 通过使用虚拟midi跳线,输出和输入示例可以作为单独的进程运行,并连接键盘输出在控制台上显示。

trans-unit.source: Write raw bytes to object buffer.
trans-unit.target: 将原始字节写入对象缓冲区。

trans-unit.source: Writes a timestamped system-exclusive midi message.

trans-unit.source: You can also run the examples in the python interpreter by calling each modules main() function.
trans-unit.target: 你也可以通过调用每个模块的main()函数在python解释器中运行这些例子。

trans-unit.source: You can call the Joystick.get_name() and Joystick.get_id() functions without initializing the Joystick object.
trans-unit.target: 您可以调用 Joystick.get_name() 和 Joystick.get_id() 函数而无需初始化Joystick对象。

trans-unit.source: You can create a CD object for each cdrom on the system. Use pygame.cdrom.get_count() to determine how many drives actually exist. The id argument is an integer of the drive, starting at zero.
trans-unit.target: 您可以为系统上的每个CDROM 创建一个 CD 对象。使用 pygame.cdrom.get_count() 确定实际存在多少个驱动器。id参数是驱动器的整数，从零开始。

trans-unit.source: You can find where the example files are installed by using the following commands inside the python interpreter.
trans-unit.target: 你可以通过在python解释器中使用以下命令来查找实例文件的安装位置。

trans-unit.source: You can load fonts from the system by using the pygame.font.SysFont() function. There are a few other functions to help lookup the system fonts.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用 pygame.font.SysFont() 函数从系统加载字体。还有一些其他功能可帮助您查找系统字体。

trans-unit.source: You can pass any surface, but most systems want a smaller image around 32x32. The image can have colorkey transparency which will be passed to the system.
trans-unit.target: 你可以通过任何表面,但大多数系统希望得到一个32x32左右的小图像。图像可以有色键透明度,它将被传递给系统。

trans-unit.source: You can pass keyword argument values to this function. These named values will be applied to the attributes of the Rect before it is returned. An example would be mysurf.get_rect(center=(100, 100)) to create a rectangle for the Surface centered at a given position.
trans-unit.target: 您可以将关键字参数值传递给此函数。这些命名的值将在返回Rect之前应用于Rect的属性。一个示例是 mysurf.get_rect(center=(100, 100)) 为以给定位置为中心的Surface创建一个矩形。

trans-unit.source: You can pass the background too. If a background is already set, then the bgd argument has no effect.
trans-unit.target: 你也可以传递背景。如果已经设置了背景,那么bgd参数就没有效果。

trans-unit.source: You can pass the function a single rectangle, or a sequence of rectangles. It is more efficient to pass many rectangles at once than to call update multiple times with single or a partial list of rectangles. If passing a sequence of rectangles it is safe to include None values in the list, which will be skipped.
trans-unit.target: 你可以向函数传递一个单一的矩形,或者一系列的矩形。一次传递多个矩形比使用单个或部分矩形列表多次调用更新更有效。如果传递一个矩形序列,安全的做法是在列表中包含None值,这将被跳过。

trans-unit.source: You can set the default layer through kwargs using 'default_layer' and an integer for the layer. The default layer is 0.
trans-unit.target: 你可以通过kwargs使用'default_layer'和层的整数来设置默认层。默认的层数是0。

trans-unit.source: You may want to initialize the different modules separately to speed up your program or to not use modules your game does not require.
trans-unit.target: 你可能想分别初始化不同的模块,以加快你的程序,或者不使用你的游戏不需要的模块。

trans-unit.source: You should consider creating a mask for your sprite at load time if you are going to check collisions many times. This will increase the performance, otherwise this can be an expensive function because it will create the masks each time you check for collisions.
trans-unit.target: 如果你要多次检查碰撞,你应该考虑在加载时为你的精灵创建一个面具。这将提高性能,否则这可能是一个昂贵的功能,因为它将在每次检查碰撞时创建面具。

trans-unit.source: You should use os.path.join() for compatibility.
trans-unit.target: 您应该使用 os.path.join() 来实现兼容性。

trans-unit.source: errors (string): If given, how to handle unencodable characters. The default is 'backslashreplace'.
